anya-e1202n:22: Vattabbameva ca bahumpi yato na vuttaṃ
anya-e1202n:25: Vuccamānaṃ mayā sādhu vaṃsaṃ thūpassa satthunoti;
anya-e1202n:26_0: Tattha thūpassa vaṃsaṃ vakkhāmīti ettha tathāgato arahaṃ sammā sambuddho thūpāraho,
anya-e1202n:26_1: paccekabuddho thūpāraho, tathāgatassa sāvako thūpāraho, rājā cakkavatti thūpārahoti
anya-e1202n:26_2: vacanato thūpārahānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā kata cetiyaṃ abbhunana taṭṭhena
anya-e1202n:26_3: thūpoti vuccati, idha pana kañcana mālika mahāthūpo adhippeto, so kassa dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1202n:26_4: katoti ce? Yodīpaṅkarādīnaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhavyākaraṇo samatiṃsapāramiyo
anya-e1202n:26_5: pūretvā paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā dhammacakkappavattanato paṭṭhāya yāva suhadda paribbājaka
anya-e1202n:26_6: vinayāna sabba buddhakiccāni niṭṭhāpetvā anupādiyesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto
anya-e1202n:26_7: tassa bhagavato arahato sammā sambuddhassa dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā kato ayamettha saṅkhepo,
anya-e1202n:27_0: 2. Ito kira kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkheyyānaṃ matthake amaravatī nāma
anya-e1202n:27_1: nagaraṃ ahosi. Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati. So aññaṃ kammaṃ akatvā brahmaṇasippameva
anya-e1202n:27_2: uggaṇhi tassa daharakāleyeva mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. Athassa rāsivaḍḍhanako amacco
anya-e1202n:27_3: āya potthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇa rajata maṇimuttādi bharite gabbhe vivaritvā ettakaṃ
anya-e1202n:27_4: te kumāra mātu santakaṃ, ettakaṃ pitusantakaṃ, ettakaṃ ayyaka payyakānanti yāva sattamā
anya-e1202n:27_5: kulaparivaṭṭā dhakaṃ ācikkhitvā etampaṭijaggāhīti āha. So sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā
anya-e1202n:28_0: 3. Punabbhave paṭisaṇdhigahaṇaṃ tāma dukkhaṃ, tathā nibbatta nibbattaṭṭhāne sarīrabhedanaṃ
anya-e1202n:28_1: ahañca jānidhammo jarādhammo vyādhidhammo maraṇadhammo. Evaṃ bhūtena mayā ajāti ajaraṃ
anya-e1202n:28_2: avyādhiṃ amaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ sītalaṃ nibbānaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatīti nekkhammakāraṇaṃ cintetvā
anya-e1202n:28_3: puna cintesi imaṃ dhanaṃ sabbaṃ mayhaṃ pitu pitāmahādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā eka
anya-e1202n:28_4: kahāpaṇampi gahetvā nagatā mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti nagare
anya-e1202n:28_5: bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā himavantassa pavisitvā tāpasa pabbajjaṃ
anya-e1202n:28_6: pabbajitvā sattāhabbhantareyeva abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetva samāpattisukhena vītināmesi.
anya-e1202n:29_0: Tadā dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā parayābhisambodhiṃ patvā satta sattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeceva
anya-e1202n:29_1: vitināmetvā sunaṇdārāme dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā koṭisattānaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammamataṃ
anya-e1202n:29_2: pāyetvā cātuddīpika mahāmegho viya dhammavassaṃ vassento catūhi khīṇāsaya satasahassehi
anya-e1202n:29_3: parivuto anupubbena cārakaṃ caramāno ramma nagaraṃ patvā sudassana mahāvihāre paṭivasati
anya-e1202n:29_4: tadā rammanagaravāsino sappi phaṇitādīni bhesajjāni gahetvā puppha dhūpa gaṇdhahatthā
anya-e1202n:29_5: yena buddho tenapasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vaṇditvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā
anya-e1202n:29_6: dhammaṃ sutvā svātanāya bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā dasabalaṃ padakkhīnaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:30_0: Te puna divase asadisa mahādānaṃ sajjetvā dasabalassa āgamana maggaṃ sodhenti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e1202n:30_1: kāle sumedhatāpaso attano assama padato uggantvā rammanagaravāsīnaṃ tesaṃ manussānaṃ
anya-e1202n:30_2: uparibhāgena ākāsena gacchantā te haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe maggaṃ sodhente disvā kinnu kho
anya-e1202n:30_3: kāraṇanti cintento sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva ākāsato oru ekamante ṭhatthāyaha te manusse
anya-e1202n:30_4: pucchi.’Hambho kassa pana imaṃ maggaṃ sodhethā’ti te āhaṃsu bhante sumedha tumhe
anya-e1202n:30_5: kiṃ naṃ jānātha, dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattavara dhammacakko
anya-e1202n:30_6: janapada cārikaṃ caramāno anukkamena amhākaṃ nagaraṃ patvā sudassana mahāvihāre paṭivasati.
anya-e1202n:30_7: Mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantayimha tassa bhagavato āgamanamaggaṃ sodhemāti. Taṃ sutvā
anya-e1202n:30_8: sumedhapaṇḍito cintesi. Buddhoti kho panesa ghosopi dullabho, pageva buddhuppādo
anya-e1202n:30_9: tena hi mayāpi imehi manussehi saddhiṃ dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ sodhetuṃ vaṭṭatīti
anya-e1202n:30_10: so te manusse āha, sace bho tumhe imaṃ magga buddhassa sodhetha - sayahampi ekaṃ
anya-e1202n:30_11: okāsaṃ sampaṭicchatvā ayaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito mahiddhiko mahānubhāvoti jānantā dubbisodhanaṃ
anya-e1202n:30_12: udakasambhinnaṃ ativisamaṃ ekaṃ okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā imaṃ hakāsaṃ tumhe sodhetha.
anya-e1202n:31_0: Sumedhapaṇḍito buddhārammaṇa pītiṃ uppādetvā cintesi. Ahampanimaṃ okāsaṃ iddhīyā
anya-e1202n:31_1: paramadassanīya kātuṃ pahomi evaṃ kato pana maṃ na paritoseti ajja pana mayā kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ
anya-e1202n:31_2: kātuṃ vaṭṭatiti paṃsuṃ āharitvā taṃ pahesaṃ pūreni, tassa pana tasmiṃ padese asodhite
anya-e1202n:31_3: jayasumana kusuma sadisi vaṇṇaṃ dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā nivāsetvā
anya-e1202n:31_4: tassupari yuṇṇamāpaṅgena kusumakalāpaṃ parakkhipanto viya vijjullatā sassīrīkaṃ kāyabaṇdhanaṃ
anya-e1202n:31_5: baṇdhitvā kanaka girisikhara matthake lākhārasaṃ parisiñcante viya suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ
anya-e1202n:31_6: pavāḷajālena parikkhipanto viya suvaṇṇaṅghakaṃ rattakambalena paṭimuñcanto viya sarada
anya-e1202n:31_7: samaya rajanikaraṃ rattavalāhakena paṭicchādento viya ca lākhārasena tinna kiṃ sukaksumavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:31_8: rattavara pasukūla cīvaraṃ pāripitvā gaṇdhakūgidva rato kanakaguhāto sīho viya nikkhamitvā
anya-e1202n:31_9: jaḷabhiññānaṃyeva catūhi khīṇāsava satasahassehi parivuto amaragaṇa parivuto dasasatanayano
anya-e1202n:31_10: viya brahmagaṇaparivuto mahā brahmā viya ca aparimita samaya samupacitāya kusalabalajanitāya
anya-e1202n:31_11: anopamayā buddhalīlāya tārāgaṇaparivuto sarada samaya rajanikaro viya gaganatalaṃ
anya-e1202n:32_0: 5. Sumedhatāpasopi tena alaṅkata paṭiyattena maggena āgacchantassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato
anya-e1202n:32_1: dvattiṃsa varalakkhaṇa patimaṇḍitaṃ asatiyā anubyañjanehi anubyañjitaṃ byāmappahāparikkhepa
anya-e1202n:32_2: sassīrīkaṃ iṇdanīlamaṇisaṃkāsoākāse nānappakārā vijjullatā viya chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo
anya-e1202n:32_3: vissajjentaṃ rūpaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ oloketvā ajja mayā dasabalassa jīvitapariccāgaṃ
anya-e1202n:32_4: kātuṃ vaṭṭati mā bhagavā kalale akkami maṇimayaṃ lakasetuṃ akkamanto viya saddhiṃ
anya-e1202n:32_5: catūhi khīṇāsava satasahassehi mama piṭṭhiṃ akkamanto gacchatu taṃ me bhavissati
anya-e1202n:32_6: dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti kese mocetvā ajinajaṭā vākacīrāni kalela pattharitvā
anya-e1202n:32_7: tattheva kalalapiṭṭhe nipajji nipanno ca sace ahaṃ iccheyyaṃ sabbakilese jhāpetvā
anya-e1202n:32_8: saṅghanavako hutvā rammanagaraṃ paviseyyaṃ aññātakavesena pana me kilese ṇdhapetvā
anya-e1202n:32_9: nibbānapattiyā kiccaṃ natthi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dīpaṅkara dasabalo viya paramābhisambodhiṃ
anya-e1202n:32_10: patvā dhammanāvaṃ āropetvā mahājanaṃ saṃsārasāgarā uttāretvā pacchā parinibbāyeyyaṃ.
anya-e1202n:32_11: Idaṃ me patirupanti cintetvā aṭṭhadhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipajja.
anya-e1202n:33_0: Dīpaṅkaropi bhagavā āgattvā sumedhapaṇḍitassa sīsasāge ṭhatvā kalalapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ
anya-e1202n:33_1: tāpasaṃ disvā ayaṃ tāpaso buddhatthāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipanto, ijjhissati nu kho
anya-e1202n:33_2: etassa patthanā udāhu noti upadhārento - anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatīti
anya-e1202n:33_3: ñatvā ṭhitakova parisa majjhe vyākāsi, passatha no tumhe bhikkhave imaṃ uggatapaṃ
anya-e1202n:33_4: tāpasaṃ kalalapiṭṭhe nipannanti. Evaṃ bhante, ayaṃ yiddhatthāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā
anya-e1202n:33_5: nipanno samijjhissati imassa patthatā kappasata sahassādhikānaṃ catuntaṃ asaṅkheyyānaṃ
anya-e1202n:33_6: matthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatīti sabbaṃ vyākāsi.
anya-e1202n:37_0: Passatha imaṃ tāpasaṃ - jaṭila uggatāpasaṃ aparimeyye ito kappe - ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
anya-e1202n:37_1: Ahu kapilavahayā rammā - nikkhamitvā tathāgato. Padhānaṃ padahitvāna - katvā dukkara kārikaṃ
anya-e1202n:45: Imassajanikā mātā - māyā nāma bhavissati, pitā suddhodano nāma - ayaṃ hessati gotamo. Anāsavā vītarāgā - santacittā samāhitā,
anya-e1202n:46: Kolito upatisso ca - aggā hessanti sāvakā;
anya-e1202n:48: Khemā uppalavaṇṇā ca - aggā hessanti sāvikā;
anya-e1202n:52_0: 6. Tato dīpaṅkaro dasabalo bodhisattaṃ pasaṃsitvā aṭṭhahi puppha muṭṭhīhi pūjetvā
anya-e1202n:52_1: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Tepi catūsata sahassa khīṇāsavā bodhisattaṃ pupphehi ca
anya-e1202n:52_2: gaṇdhehi ca pūjetvā padapphaṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu. Devamanussā ca tatheva pūjetvā
anya-e1202n:52_3: vaṇditvā atha kho bodhisatto dasabalassa vyākaraṇaṃ sutvā buddhabhāvaṃ karatalagatamiva
anya-e1202n:52_4: maññamāno pamudita hadayo sabbesu paṭikkantesu sayanā vuṭṭhāya puppharāsi matthake
anya-e1202n:52_5: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno buddhakārakadhamme upadhārento kahananu kho buddhakāraka
anya-e1202n:52_6: dhammā, kiṃ uddhaṃ adho disāsu vīdīyāsūti anukkamena sakalaṃ dhammadhātuṃ vicinanto
anya-e1202n:52_7: porāṇakabodhisattehi āsevita nisevita paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ disvā tattha daḷabhisamādāna
anya-e1202n:52_8: katvā evaṃ anukkamena sīla - nekkhamma - paññā - vīriya - khanti - sacca - adhiṭṭhāna
anya-e1202n:52_9: - mettā - upekkhā pāramiyoca disvā tatthadaḷha samādānaṃ katvā devatāhi abhitthuto
anya-e1202n:53_0: Dīpaṅkaropi satthā catūhi khīṇāsava satasahassehi parivuto rammanagaravāsīhi pūjīyamāno
anya-e1202n:53_1: devatāhi abhinaṇdiyamāno alaṅkata paṭiyattena maggena rammanagaraṃ pavisitvā paññattavarabuddhāsane
anya-e1202n:53_2: nisīdi. Bhikkhusaṅghopi attano attano pattāsane nisīdi. Rammanagaravāsinopi upāsakā
anya-e1202n:53_3: buddhapamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onīta pattapāṇiṃ
anya-e1202n:53_4: mālāgaṇdhādīhi pūjetvā dānānumodanaṃ sotukāmā nisīdiṃsu. Bhagavāpi tesaṃ anumodanaṃ
anya-e1202n:53_5: karonto dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggikathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme
anya-e1202n:53_6: ānisaṃsañca pakāsetvā amata pariyosānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e1202n:54_0: Evaṃ tassa mahajanassa dhammaṃ desetvā ekacce saraṇesu ekacce pañcasu sīlesu ekacce
anya-e1202n:54_1: sotāpattiphale ekacce sakadāgāmi phale ekacce anāgāmī phale ekacce catusupi phalesu
anya-e1202n:54_2: ekacce tīsu vijjāsu ekacce chaḷabhiññāsu ekacce aṭṭhasu samāpattisu patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1202n:54_3: uṭṭhāyāsanā rammanagarato nikkhamitvā sudassana mahāvihārameva pāvisi.
anya-e1202n:59: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu - sīle dasavidhe paraṃ;
anya-e1202n:61: Kassaci asathe dhamme - deti so paṭisambhidā;
anya-e1202n:70_0: Iti so dīpaṅkaro satthā vassasata sahassāni ṭhatvā sattānaṃ baṇdhanamokkhaṃ kurumāno
anya-e1202n:70_1: sabbabuddhakiccāni niṭṭhāpetvā naṇdārāme anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyinaheva
anya-e1202n:70_2: dhātuyo tassa - satthuno vikiriṃsu tā. Ṭhitā ekaghanā hutvā - suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya
anya-e1202n:70_3: sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā ghanakoṭiṭimasuvaṇṇaṭṭhikāhi evaṃ chattiṃsa yojanikaṃ
anya-e1202n:76_0: 7. Dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato aparabhāgo ekaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma
anya-e1202n:76_1: satthā udapādi. Tadā bodhisatto vijitāvi nāma cakkavatti hutvā koṭisatasahassa saṅkhassa
anya-e1202n:76_2: buddha pamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāyi satthā bodhisattaṃ buddho bhavissatīti
anya-e1202n:76_3: vyākaritvā dhammaṃ desesi so satthu dhammaṃkathaṃ sutvā rajji niyyādetvā pabbaji
anya-e1202n:76_4: so tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcaabhiññāyoca uppādetvā aparihīnajjhāno
anya-e1202n:76_5: brahmaloke nibbatti. Sopi buddho vassasatasahassāni ṭhatvā sabbabuddhakiccāni niṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1202n:76_6: caṇdārāme parinibbāyi tassāpi bhagavato dhātuyā na vikiriṃsu sakalajambudīpavāsino
anya-e1202n:76_8: tela sappīhi udakakiccaṃ katvā cetiyaṃ niṭṭhāpesuṃ
anya-e1202n:79_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṃṅkhayyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe cattāro buddhā uppajjiṃsu
anya-e1202n:79_1: - maṅgalo sumano revato yohitoti. Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato kāle bodhisatto suruci
anya-e1202n:79_2: nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā satthāraṃ nimantessāmīti upasaṅkamitvā madhura dhammaṃkataṃ sutvā
anya-e1202n:79_3: svātanāya nimantetvā koṭisatasahassa saṅkhassa buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa sattāhaṃ
anya-e1202n:79_4: gavapānaṃ nāma dānamadāsi satthā anumodanaṃ karonto mahāpurisaṃ āmantetvā tvaṃ kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ
anya-e1202n:79_5: dvannaṃ asaṅkheyyānaṃ matthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissasīti vyākāsi mahāpuriso
anya-e1202n:79_6: vyākaraṇaṃ sutvā ahaṃ kira buddho bhavissāmi ko me gharāvāsena attho pabbajissamīti
anya-e1202n:79_7: cintatvā tathārūpaṃ sampattiṃ keḷapiṇḍaṃ vīya pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā buddhavacanaṃ
anya-e1202n:79_8: uggaṇhitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā āyupariyosāne brahmaloke nibbatti,
anya-e1202n:79_9: tasmimpi buddhe parinibbute dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu, jambudīpavāsino pubbe viya tiṃsayojanakaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:80: Tena vuttaṃ “uyyāne vasabho nāma - buddho nibbāyi maṅgalo, tattheva tassa jinathūpo - tiṃsayojanamuggito”ti.
anya-e1202n:81_0: Tassa aparabhāge sumano nāma satthā udapādi tadā mahāsatto atulo nāma nāgarājā hutvā
anya-e1202n:81_1: nibbatti-mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo so buddho uppannoti sutvā ñātisaṅghaparivuto nāgabhavanā
anya-e1202n:81_2: nikkhamitvā koṭisatasahassa bhikkhuparivārassa tassa bhagavato dibbaturiyehi upahāraṃ
anya-e1202n:81_3: kāretvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paccekaṃ dussayugāni datvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāsi sopi
anya-e1202n:81_4: naṃ satthā anāgate buddho bhavissasīti vyākāsi tasmimpi buddhe parinibbute dhātuyo
anya-e1202n:81_5: na vikiriṃsu jambudīpavāsano pubbe viya catuyojanikaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:85_0: Tassa aparabhāge revato nāma satthā udapādi tadā bodhisatto atidevo nāma brāhmaṇo
anya-e1202n:85_1: hutvā satthu dhammadesana sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya sirasi añjaliṃ paggahetvā tassa
anya-e1202n:85_2: satthuno kilesappahāne vaṇṇaṃ vatvā uttarāsaṅghena pūjamakāsi. Sopi naṃ satthā buddho
anya-e1202n:85_3: bhavissatiti vyākāsi tasmiṃ pana buddhe parinibbute dhātuyo vikiriṃsu.
anya-e1202n:88: Dhātu vitthārikaṃ āsī - tesu tesu padesato”ti;
anya-e1202n:89_0: Tassa aparabhāge sobhito nāma satthā udapādi tadā bodhisatto ajito nāma brāhmaṇo
anya-e1202n:89_1: hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭāya buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ
anya-e1202n:89_2: adāsi. Sopi naṃ satthā buddho bhavissasīti vyākāsi tassāpi bhagavato dhātuyo vikiriṃsu.
anya-e1202n:93: Tassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkheyyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu - anomadassi padumo nāradoti. Anomadassissa bhagavato kāle bodhisatto eko
anya-e1202n:95_0: Yakkha senāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo aneka koṭisatasahassānaṃ yakkhānaṃ adhipati.
anya-e1202n:95_1: So buddho uppannoti sutvā āgantvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānamadāsi satthāpi
anya-e1202n:95_2: taṃ anāgate buddho bhavissasīti vyākāsi. Anomadassimhi pana bhagavati parinibbute
anya-e1202n:95_3: dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu jambudīpavāsino pañcavīsayojanakaṃ thūpaṃ kariṃsu
anya-e1202n:99_0: Tassa aparabhāge padumo nāma satthā udapādi tathāgate agāmakāraññe viharentā bodhisatto
anya-e1202n:99_1: sīho hutvā satthāraṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpannaṃ disvā pasannacitto vaṇditvā padakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:99_2: katvā pītisomanassajāto tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā sattāhaṃ buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ
anya-e1202n:99_3: avijahitvā pītisukheneva gocarāya apakkamitvā jivitapariccāgaṃ katvā payirupāsamāno
anya-e1202n:99_4: aṭṭhāsi satthā sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhito sīhaṃ oloketvā bhikkhusaṅghepi cittaṃ
anya-e1202n:99_5: pasādetvā saṅghaṃ vaṇdissatī“ti bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatūti cintesi bhikkhu tāvadeva
anya-e1202n:99_6: āgamiṃsu sīho saṅghe cittaṃ pasādesi. Satthā tassa manaṃ oloketvā anāgate buddho
anya-e1202n:99_7: bhavissatīti vyākāsi tassa pana bhagavato dhātuyo vikiriṃsu.
anya-e1202n:102: Dhātu vitthārikaṃ āsi - tesu tesu padesato”ti;
anya-e1202n:103_0: Tassa aparabhāge nārado nāma satthā ahosi tadā bodhisatto, isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
anya-e1202n:103_1: pañcasu abhiññāsu aṭṭhasuca samāpattisuciṇṇavasī hutvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa
anya-e1202n:103_2: mahādānaṃ datvā lohita caṇdanena pūjamakāsi sopi naṃ anāgato buddho bhavissatīti
anya-e1202n:103_3: vyākāsi nārada pana bhagavato dhātuyo ekaghanā ahesuṃ. Sabbe deva manussā sannipatitvā
anya-e1202n:107_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkheyyamatikkamitvā ito kappasatasahassa matthake ekasmiṃ
anya-e1202n:107_1: kappe padumuttaro nāma satthā udapādi. Tadā bodhisatto jaṭilo nāma mahāraṭṭhiko hutvā
anya-e1202n:107_2: buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa civaradānamadāsi. Sopi taṃ anāgato buddho bhavissatīti
anya-e1202n:107_3: vyākāsi. Padumuttarassāpi bhagavato dhātuyo ekaghanā ahesuṃ. Sabbe devamanussā sannipatitvā
anya-e1202n:111_0: Tassa aparabhāge tiṃsakappa sahassāni atikkamitvā sumedho sujāto cāti ekasmiṃ kappe
anya-e1202n:111_1: dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu sumedhassa pana bhagavato kāle bodhisatto uttaro nāma mānavo
anya-e1202n:111_2: hutvā nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃyeva asītikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa
anya-e1202n:111_3: mahādānaṃ datvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya nikkhamitvā pabbaji sopi naṃ anāgate
anya-e1202n:111_4: buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi. Sumdhessa pana bhagavato dhātuyo vikiriṃsu
anya-e1202n:115_0: Tassa aparabhāge sujāto nāma satthā udapādi. Tadā bodhisattocakkavattirājā hutvā
anya-e1202n:115_1: buddho uppannoti sutvā upasaṃkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa saddhiṃ
anya-e1202n:115_2: sattahi ratanehi catumahādīpaṃ rajjaṃ datvā satthu santike pabbaji sakalaraṭṭhavāsino
anya-e1202n:115_3: raṭṭhuppādaṃ gahetvā ārāmika kiccaṃ sādhentā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa niccaṃ mahādānamadaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:115_4: Sopi naṃ satthā anāgate buddhobhavissatīti vyākāsi sujātassa pana bhagavato dhātuyo
anya-e1202n:119_0: Tassa aparabhāge aṭṭhārasa kappasatamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe piyadassi atthadassi dhammadassiti
anya-e1202n:119_1: tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu piyadassi buddhakāle bodhisatto kassapo nāma māṇavo tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:119_2: vedānaṃ pāragato hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā koṭisatasahassa dhana pariccāgena
anya-e1202n:119_3: saṅghārāmaṃ kāretvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāsi atha naṃ satthā aṭṭhārasa kappa
anya-e1202n:119_4: sataccayena buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi piyadassissa bhagavatopi dhātuyo ekaghanāva
anya-e1202n:123_0: Tassa aparabhāge atthadassi nāma bhagavā udapādi tadā bodhisatto mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo
anya-e1202n:123_1: susimo nāma tāpaso hutvā bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasīditvā dibbāni maṇdārava
anya-e1202n:123_2: padumapāricchattakādīni pupphāni āharitvā cātudvīpika mahāmegho viya pupphavassaṃ
anya-e1202n:123_3: vassetvā samantato pupphamaṇḍapa pupphaagaghiya toraṇādīni katvā maṇdārava pupphacchattena
anya-e1202n:123_4: dasabalaṃ pūjesi sopi naṃ bhagavā anāgato gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatīti vākāsi.
anya-e1202n:126: Dhātuvitthārikaṃ āsi - tesu tesu ca raṭṭhato”ti;
anya-e1202n:127_0: Tassa aparabhāge dhammadassi nāma satthā udapādi. Tadā bodhisatto sakkā devarājā
anya-e1202n:127_1: dibbagaṇdhapupphehi ca dibbaturiyehi ca pūjaṃ akāsi sopi naṃ buddho bhavissatīti
anya-e1202n:127_2: vyākāsi. Dhammadassissa pana bhagavato dhātuyo ekaghanā ahesuṃ. Jambudīpavāsino tiyojanikaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:131_0: Tassa aparabhāge catunavutikappa matthake ekasmiṃ kappe ekova siddhattho nāma satthā
anya-e1202n:131_1: udapādi. Tadā bodhisatto uggatejo abhiññābala sampanno maṅgalo nāma tāpaso hutvā
anya-e1202n:131_2: mahājambuphalaṃ āharitvā tathāgassa adāsi satthā taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjitvā catunavuti
anya-e1202n:131_3: kappamatthake buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi tassāpi bhagavato dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu,
anya-e1202n:135_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito dvānavuti kappamatthake tisso phussoti ekasmiṃ kappe deva buddhā
anya-e1202n:135_1: nibbattiṃsu tissassa bhagavato kāle bodhisattā mahābhogo mahāyaso sujāto nāma khattiyo
anya-e1202n:135_2: hutvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahiddhikabhāvaṃ patvā buddho uppannoti sutvā dibbamaṇdārava
anya-e1202n:135_3: paduma pāricchatta pupphāni ādāya catuparisamajjhe gacchantaṃ tathāgataṃ pūjesi.
anya-e1202n:135_4: Ākāse pupphavitānamiva aṭṭhāsi sopi naṃ satthā ito dvānavuti kappamatthake buddho
anya-e1202n:135_5: bhavissatīti vyākāsi. Tassāpi bhagavato dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu dhātuyo gahetvā tiyojanikaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:139_0: Tassa aparabhāge phusso nāma buddho udapādi tadā bodhisatto vijitāvi nāma khattiyo
anya-e1202n:139_1: hutvā mahārajjaṃ pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā mahājanassa
anya-e1202n:139_2: dhammakathaṃ kathetvā sīlapāramiñca pūresi. Sopi naṃ buddho tatheva vyākāsi tassa
anya-e1202n:143_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito ekanavuti kappamatthake vipassi nāma buddho udapādi tadā bodhisatto
anya-e1202n:143_1: mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo atulo nāma nāgarājā hutvā sattaratana khacitaṃ sovaṇṇamahāpīṭhaṃ
anya-e1202n:143_2: bhagavato adāsi sopi naṃ ito ekanavutikappamatthake buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi tassa
anya-e1202n:143_3: pana bhagavato dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu sabbe devamanussā santipatitvā dhātuyo gahetvā
anya-e1202n:147_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito ekatiṃsa kappamatthake sikhī vessabhūti dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu
anya-e1202n:147_1: sikhissa bhagavato kāle bodhisatto ariṇdamo nāma rājā hutvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa
anya-e1202n:147_2: sacivaraṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattaratana patimaṇḍitaṃ hatthiratanaṃ datvā hatthippamāṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:147_3: katvā kappiya bhaṇḍamadāsi sopi naṃ ito ekatiṃsa kappe buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi,
anya-e1202n:147_4: sikhissa bhagavato dhātuyo ekaghanā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu, sakala jambudīpavāsino pana manussā
anya-e1202n:147_5: dhātuyo gahetvā tiyojanubbedhaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ himagiri sadisa sobhaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:150_0: Tassa aparabhāge vessabhū nāma satthā udapādi. Tadā bodhisatto sudassano nāma rājā
anya-e1202n:150_1: hutvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa sacīvaramahādānaṃ datvā tassa santike pabbajitvā
anya-e1202n:150_2: ācāraguṇasampanno buddharatane citatīkāra pīti bahulo ahosi sepi naṃ satthā ito ekatiṃsakappe
anya-e1202n:150_3: buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi vessabhussa pana bhagavato dhātuyo vikiriṃsu.
anya-e1202n:154_0: Tassa aparabhāge imasmiṃ kappe cattāro buddhā nibbattiṃsu kakusaṇdho konāgamano kassapo
anya-e1202n:154_1: amhākaṃ bhagavāti katusaṇdhassa pana bhagavato kālo bodhisatto khemo nāma rājā hutvā
anya-e1202n:154_2: buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa sapattacīvaraṃ dānañceva añjanādi bhesajjāni ca datvā
anya-e1202n:154_3: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbaji sopi naṃ satthā vyākāsi tassa pana bhagavato dhātuyo
anya-e1202n:154_4: na vikiriṃsu sabbe sannipatitvā dhātuyo gahetvā gāvutubbedhaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:158_0: Tassa aparabhāge konāgamano nāma satthā udapādi tadā bodhisatto pabbato nāma rajā
anya-e1202n:158_1: hutvā amaccagaṇa parivuto satthu santike gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā buddhapamukhaṃ
anya-e1202n:158_2: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā pattuṇṇacīnapaṭṭa koseyya kambala
anya-e1202n:158_3: dukulāni ceva suvaṇṇapaṭṭakañca datvā satthu santike pabbaji. Sopi naṃ satthā vyākāsi
anya-e1202n:162_0: Tassa aparabhāge kassapo nāma satthā udapādi. Tadā bodhisatto jotipālo nāma māṇavo
anya-e1202n:162_1: hutvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragubhūmiyañceva antalikkheva pākaṭo ghaṭīkārassa kumbhakārassa
anya-e1202n:162_2: mitto ahosi. So tena saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhamma
anya-e1202n:163_0: Kathaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā āraddhavīriyo tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā vattā vattasampattiyā
anya-e1202n:163_1: buddhasāsanaṃ sobhesi. Sopi naṃ satthā vyākāsi. Kassapassa pana satthuno dhātuyo
anya-e1202n:163_2: na vikiriṃsu sakala jambudīpavāsino manussā sannipatitvā ekekaṃ suvaṇṇaṭṭhikaṃ koṭi
anya-e1202n:163_3: agghanakaṃ ratanavicittaṃ bahi racanatthaṃ ekekaṃ aḍḍhakoṭi agghanakaṃ abbhantara
anya-e1202n:163_4: pūraṇatthaṃ manosilāya mattikākiccaṃ telena udakakiccaṃ karontā yojanubbedhaṃ thupamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:171: Siddhatthabuddho tisso ca-vipassi ca sikhī tathā;
anya-e1202n:174: Yasmā tasmā mayā sādhū-te sabbepi pakāsitā,
anya-e1202n:175: Thūpā saddhā janā sādhū-te vaṇdeyyatha sādaraṃ;
anya-e1202n:177: Dhātu vitthārikā āsuṃ - tesu tesu padesatoti;
anya-e1202n:178: Sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse vijjamānathūpānaṃ buddhānaṃ thūpakathā ceva sabbesaṃ santike abhinihārakatāce. Samattā.
anya-e1202n:179_0: Kassapassa pana bhagavato aparabhāge ṭhapetvā imaṃ sammā sambuddhaṃ añño buddho nāma
anya-e1202n:179_1: natthi. Evaṃ dīpaṅkarādīnaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhavyākaraṇo bodhisatto
anya-e1202n:182_0: Evaṃ mahāpathavi kampanāni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne tato cuto tusitabhavane nibbatti
anya-e1202n:182_1: tattha aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhitvā yāvatāyukaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto
anya-e1202n:182_2: manussagaṇanāya sattahi divasehi āyukkhayaṃ pāpuṇissatiti vatthāni kiḷissanti, mālā
anya-e1202n:182_3: milāyanti, kacchehi sedā muccanti, kāyeceva dubbaṇṇiyaṃ okkamati. Devo devāsane nābhiramatīti
anya-e1202n:182_4: imesu pañcasu pubbanimittesu uppannesu tāni disvāsuññāvata no saggā bhavissantiti
anya-e1202n:182_5: saṃvegajātāhi devatāhi mahāsattassa pāraminaṃ pūritabhāvaṃ ñatvā imasmiṃ idāni aññaṃ
anya-e1202n:182_6: devalokaṃ anupagantvā manussaloke uppajjitvā buddhabhāvaṃ patte puññāni katvā cuta
anya-e1202n:187_0: Evaṃ buddhabhāvatthāya āyācito kālaṃ-dīpaṃ-desaṃ kulaṃ-janettiyā āyuppamāṇanti imāni
anya-e1202n:187_1: pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā katasanniṭṭhāno tato cuto sakyarājakule paṭisaṇdhiṃgahetvā
anya-e1202n:187_2: tattha mahāsampattiyā parihariyamāno anukkamena bhaddaṃ yobbanaṃ anupāpuṇitvā tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:187_3: utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu devalokasiriṃ viya rajjasiriṃ anubhavamāno uyyānakīḷāya
anya-e1202n:187_4: gamanasamaye anukkamena jiṇṇa - vyādhi - matasaṅkhāte tayo devadūte disvā saṃjāta
anya-e1202n:187_5: saṃvegā nivattitvā catutthe vāre pabbajitaṃ disvā sādhu pabbajjāti pabbajjāya ruciṃ
anya-e1202n:187_6: uppādetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha divasaṃ khepetvā maṅgala pokkharaṇitīre nisinno kappaka
anya-e1202n:187_7: vesaṃ gahetvā āgatena vissakamma devaputtena alaṅkata paṭiyatto rāhulakumārassa pātasāsanaṃ
anya-e1202n:187_8: sutvā puttasinehassa balavabhāvaṃ ñatvā yāva imaṃ baṇdhanaṃ na vaḍḍhati tāvadevanaṃ
anya-e1202n:188: “Nibbutā nūna sā mātā - nibbuto nūna so pitā,
anya-e1202n:189: Nibbutā nūna sā nārī - yassāyaṃ īdiso pati”ti;
anya-e1202n:190_0: Kisāgotamiyā nāma pitucchā dhītāya bhāsitaṃ imaṃ gāthā sutvā ihaṃ imāya nibbutapadaṃ
anya-e1202n:190_1: sāvitoti gīvato satasahassagghanakaṃ muttāhāraṃ omuñcitvā tassā pesetvā attano bhavanaṃ
anya-e1202n:190_2: pavisitvā sirīsayane nipanno niddāvasa gatānaṃ nāṭakānaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā nibbinnahadayo
anya-e1202n:190_3: channaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā kaṇthakaṃ āhārāpetvā taṃ āruyha channasahāyo dasasahassa cakkavāḷa
anya-e1202n:190_4: devatāhi kata parivāro mahābhinikkhamanā nikkhamitvā teneva rattāvasesena tīṇi rajjāni
anya-e1202n:190_5: atikkamma anomāya nadiyā paratīraṃ patvā assāpiṭṭhito oruyha muttarāsi sadise cālikāpuliṇe
anya-e1202n:190_6: ṭhatvā channatvaṃ mayhaṃ ābharaṇāni ceva kaṇthakañca ādāya gacchāhi ābharaṇāni ca
anya-e1202n:190_7: kaṇthakañca paṭicchāpetvā dakkhiṇa hatthena maṅgalakhaggamādāya vāmahatthena moliyā
anya-e1202n:190_8: saddhiṃ cūḷaṃ chiṇditvā sace ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmi ākāse tiṭṭhatu no ce bhūmiyaṃ
anya-e1202n:190_9: patatūti ākāse khipi cuḷāmaṇī baṇdhanaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃgantvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi
anya-e1202n:190_10: atha sakko devarājā yojanikena ratanacaṅgoṭakena paṭiggahesi.
anya-e1202n:196_0: Paṭiggahetvā ca pana devalokaṃ netvā suneru muddhani tiyojanappamāṇaṃ iṇdanīlamaṇimayaṃ
anya-e1202n:196_1: cuḷāmaṇi cetiyaṃ nāma akāsi atha kassapa buddhakāle porāṇa sahāyako ghaṭikāra mahābrahmā
anya-e1202n:196_2: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ vināvāsabhāvappattena mattabhāvo cittesi. Ajja me sahāyako mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
anya-e1202n:197: “Ticīvarañca patto ca vāsi sūci ca baṇdhanaṃ,
anya-e1202n:199_0: Ime samaṇaparikkhāre āharitvā adāsi mahāpuriso arahaddhajaṃ nivāsetvā uttamaṃ pabbajjāvesaṃ
anya-e1202n:199_1: gaṇhitvā sāṭakayugalaṃ ākāse khipi taṃ brahmā paṭiggahetvā brahmaloke dvādasayojanikaṃ
anya-e1202n:203: Na kareyya mahussāhaṃva-ko hi nāma budho jano”ti;
anya-e1202n:205_0: 9. Bodhisatto pabbajitvā anukkamena rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha piṇḍāya caritvā paṇḍava
anya-e1202n:205_1: pabbatapabbhāre nisinno magadharājena rajjena nimantiyamāno taṃ paṭikkhipitvā sabbaññutaṃ
anya-e1202n:205_2: patvā tissavijitaṃ āgamanatthāyatenagahita paṭiñño āḷāraṃ-uddakañca upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e1202n:205_3: tesaṃ santike adhigatavisesena aparituṭṭho chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ padahitvā visākha
anya-e1202n:205_4: puṇṇama divase senāninigame sujātāya dinnapāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā nerañjarāya nadiyā
anya-e1202n:205_5: suvaṇṇapātiṃ pavāhetvā nerañjarāya tīre mahāvanasaṇḍe nānāsamāpattīhi divābhāgaṃ
anya-e1202n:205_6: vitināmetvā sāyaṇha samaye sotthiyena dinnaṃ tiṇamuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā kāḷena nāgarājena
anya-e1202n:205_7: abhitthutaguṇo bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha tiṇāni. Sattharitvā na tāvīmaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhiṇdissāmi
anya-e1202n:205_8: yāva me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā pācīna dāsābhimukho
anya-e1202n:205_9: nisīditvā-sūriye anatthamiteyeva mārabalaṃ vidhametvā paṭhamayāme pubbe nivāsañāṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:205_10: majjhimayāme cutūpapātañāṇaṃ patvā pacchimayāmāvasāne dasabala catuvesārajjādi sabbaguṇapatimaṇḍitaṃsabbaññutañāṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:205_11: paṭivijjhitvā satta sattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe ajapāla
anya-e1202n:205_12: nigrodhamūle nisinno dhammagambhīratā paccavekkhanena appossukkataṃ āpajjamāno dasadahassī
anya-e1202n:205_13: mahābrahma parivārena sahampati mahābrahmunā āyācita dhammadesano buddhacakkhunā
anya-e1202n:205_14: lokaṃ olokento brahmuno ajjhesanaṃ ādāya kassa nu kho paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyanti
anya-e1202n:205_15: olokento āḷāruddakānaṃ kālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā pañcavaggīyānaṃ bhikkhunaṃ bahūpakārataṃ
anya-e1202n:205_16: anussaritvā uṭṭhāyāsanā kāsipuraṃ gacchanto antarāmagge upakena saddhiṃ mantetvā
anya-e1202n:205_17: āsāḷahipuṇṇama divase isipatane migadāye pañca vaggiyānaṃ bhikkhunaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1202n:205_18: patvā te ananucchavikena āvuso vādena samudācarante aññāpetvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattento
anya-e1202n:206_0: Tato paṭṭhāya cattālīsa saṃvaccharāni ṭhatvā caturāsīti dhammakkhaṇdha sahassāni
anya-e1202n:206_1: desetvā gaṇanapathamatīte satte bhavakantārato santāretvā sabbabuddhakiccāni niṭṭhapetvā
anya-e1202n:206_2: kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālāna mantare uttasīsakaṃ paññatte
anya-e1202n:206_3: mañcake visākhapuṇṇama divase dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno anuṭṭhānaseyyāya
anya-e1202n:206_4: nipajji. Tadā kira bhagavato pūjāya yamakasālā sabbapāliphullā mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva
anya-e1202n:206_5: aggā ekacchannā ahesuṃ. Na kevalañca yamakasālāyeva sabbepi rukkhasākhā sabbapāliphullāva ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:207_0: Na kevalañca tasmiṃyeva uyyāne sakalepi dasasahassa cakkavāḷe phalupaga rukkhā phalaṃ
anya-e1202n:207_1: gaṇhiṃsu. Sabbarukkhānaṃ khaṇdhesu khaṇdha padumāni, valalīsu valalipadumāni. Ākāse
anya-e1202n:207_2: ullokapadumāni, pathavitalaṃ bhiṇditvā daṇḍakapadumāni pupphiṃsu. Sabbo mahā samuddo
anya-e1202n:207_3: pañcavaṇṇa padumasañchanno ahosi tiyojana sahassavitthato pana himavā ghanabaddhamorapiñchakalāpo
anya-e1202n:207_4: viya nirantaraṃ mālādāmagavakkhito viya suṭṭhu pīḷetvā ābaddhapupphavaṭaṃsako viya
anya-e1202n:207_5: supūrita pupphacaṅgeṭakaṃ viya ca atiramaṇīyo ahosi.
anya-e1202n:208_1: vikiranti. Dibbānipi maṇdārava pupphāni antalikkhā patanti. Tāni honti suvaṇṇa vaṇṇāni
anya-e1202n:208_2: paṇṇacchattappamāṇāni mahātumbamattaṃ reṇu gaṇhanti na kevalañca maṇdārava pupphāneca,
anya-e1202n:208_3: aññānipi sabbāni pāricchattaka pupphādīni suvaṇṇavaṅgoṭakāni rajatacaṅgoṭakāni ca
anya-e1202n:208_4: pūretvā pūretvā tidasa purepi brahmalokepi ṭhitāhi devatāhi vividhāni antarā avippakiṇṇāneva
anya-e1202n:208_5: hutvā āgantvā pattakiṃjakkha reṇu cuṇṇehi tathāgatassa sarīrameva okīranti na kevalañca
anya-e1202n:208_6: devatānaṃyeva nāga supaṇṇa manussānampi upakappana caṇdana cuṇṇāni na kevalañca caṇdanacuṇṇāneva
anya-e1202n:208_7: kāḷānusārī tagara lohitacaṇdanādi sabbagaṇdhajātacuṇṇāni, haritālañjana suvaṇṇa rajata
anya-e1202n:208_8: cuṇṇāni, sabbagaṇdhavāsa vikatiyo suvaṇṇa rajatādisamugge pūretvā cakkavāḷa mukhavaṭṭiādisu
anya-e1202n:208_9: ṭhitāhi devatāhi paviddhā antarā avippakiritvā tathāgatasseva sarīraṃ okiranti dibbānipi
anya-e1202n:208_10: turiyāni antalikkhe vajjanti. Na kevalañca tāniyeva sabbānipi tantibaddha cammapariyonaddha
anya-e1202n:208_11: susirādi bhedāni dasasahassacakkavāḷe deva-nāgava-supaṇṇa-manussānaṃ turiyāni ekacakkavāḷe
anya-e1202n:209_0: Varacāraṇadevatā kira nāmekā dīghāyukā devatā mahāpuriso manussapathe nibbattitvā
anya-e1202n:209_1: buddho bhavissatīti sutva paṭisaṇdhidivase gaṇhitvā gamissāmāti mālā ganthituṃ ārabhiṃsu
anya-e1202n:209_2: tā gaṇthamānāva mahāpurise mātukucchiyaṃ nibbatte tumbhe kassa gaṇthathāti vuttā
anya-e1202n:209_3: na tāva tiṭṭhāti kucchito nikkhamana divase gahetvā gamissāmāti āhaṃsu puna nikkhentoti
anya-e1202n:209_4: sutvā mahābhinikkhamanadivase gamissāmāti mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantoti sutvā abhisambodhi
anya-e1202n:209_5: divase gamissāmāti. Ajja abhisambuddhoti sutvā dhammacakkappavattanadivase gamissāmāti
anya-e1202n:209_6: dhammacakkaṃ pavattayīti sutvā yamakapāṭihāriyadivase gamissāmāti. Ajja yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
anya-e1202n:209_7: karīti sutvā devo rohanadivase gamissāmāti. Ajja devorohanaṃ karīti sutvā āyusaṅkhārossajjane
anya-e1202n:209_8: gamissāmāti āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajīti sutvā na tāva niṭṭhāti parinibbānadivase gamissāmāti?
anya-e1202n:210_0: Ajja bhagavā yamakasālānamantare dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ upagato
anya-e1202n:210_1: balava paccusamaye parinibbāyissati tumhe kassa gaṇthathāti vuttā pana kinnāmetaṃ
anya-e1202n:210_2: ajjeva mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisaṇdhiṃ gaṇhi ajjeva kucchito nikkhanto, ajjeva mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
anya-e1202n:210_3: nikkhami. Ajjevabuddho ahosi ajjeva dhammacakkaṃ pavattayi. Ajjeva yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
anya-e1202n:210_4: akāsi. Ajjeva devalokā otinaṇṇā. Ajjeva āyusaṅkharaṃ ossaji. Ajjeva kira parinibbuto.
anya-e1202n:210_5: Nanu nāma dutiya divase yāgupāna kālamattampi ṭhātabbaṃ assa, dasa pāramiyo pūretvā
anya-e1202n:210_6: buddhattaṃ pattassa nāma ananucchavikanti apari niṭṭhitāva mālāyo gahetvā āgamma
anya-e1202n:210_7: anto cakkavāḷe okāsaṃ ālabhamānā cakkavāḷa mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ labhitvā ādhāvantiyo hatthena
anya-e1202n:210_8: hatthaṃ gīvāya gīvaṃ gahetvā tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhadvattiṃsamahapurisalakkhaṇāni chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo
anya-e1202n:210_9: dasapāramiyo addhacchaṭṭhāni jātakasatāni cuddassa buddhañāṇāni ārabbha gāyitvā tassa
anya-e1202n:210_10: tassa avasāne sahāya he sahāya heti vadanti. Idametaṃ paṭiccavuttaṃ-dibbānipi saṃgītāni
anya-e1202n:211_0: Bhagavā pana evaṃ mahatiyā pūjāya vattamānayā paṭhamayāme mallānaṃ dhammaṃ desesi
anya-e1202n:211_1: majjhimayāme subhaddassa dhammaṃ desetvā taṃ maggaphale patiṭṭhāpesi pacchimayāme
anya-e1202n:211_2: bhikkhu ovaditvā balava paccūsa samaye mahāpathaviṃ kampento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
anya-e1202n:211_3: parinibbāyi parinibbute pana bhagavati lokanāthe ānaṇdatthero mallarājunaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ
anya-e1202n:211_4: āroceti te sutvāva gaṇdhamālaṃ sabbañca tālāvacaraṃ pañca ca dussayugasatāni ādāya
anya-e1202n:211_5: gantvā bhagavato sarīraṃ naccehi - gītehi - vāditehi - mālehi - gaṇdhehi sakkarontā
anya-e1202n:211_6: garukarontā mānentā - pūjentā celavitānāni karontā maṇḍala mālāni paṭiyādentā evaṃ
anya-e1202n:212_0: Atha devatānañca kosinārakānaṃ mallānañca etadahosi-ativikālo kho ajja bhagavato
anya-e1202n:212_1: sarīra jhāpetuṃ, svedāni bhagavato sarīraṃ jhapessāmāti tathā dutiyampi divasaṃ vītināmesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:212_2: Tathā tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ chaṭṭhampi divasaṃ vītināmesuṃ satta me divase devatā
anya-e1202n:212_3: ca dosinārakā mallā ca bhagavato sarīraṃ dibbehi mānusakehi ca nacchehi - gītehi
anya-e1202n:212_4: - vāditehi - mālehi - gaṇdhehi sakkāronto garukarontā mānentā pūjentā nagaramajjhena
anya-e1202n:212_5: nīharitvā yattha makuṭabaṇdhanaṃ nāma mallānaṃ cetiyaṃ tattha nikkhipiṃsu
anya-e1202n:213_0: Tena kho pana samayena kusinārā yāva saṇdhisamala saṃkaṭīrājannumattena odhinā maṇdārava
anya-e1202n:213_1: pupphena satthatā hoti atha kho kosinārakā mallā bhagavato sarīraṃ cakkavattissa
anya-e1202n:213_2: sarīraṃ viya ahatena vatthena veṭhesuṃ ahatena vatthena veṭhetvā vihatena kappāsena
anya-e1202n:213_3: veṭhesuṃ vihatena kappāsena veṭhetvā ahatena vatthena veṭhesuṃ. Eteneva nayena pañcahiyugasatehi
anya-e1202n:213_4: veṭhetvā āyasāya teladoṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissā āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujjetvā sabbagaṇdhānaṃ
anya-e1202n:213_5: citakaṃ karitvā bhagavato sarīraṃ citakaṃ āropesuṃ. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā
anya-e1202n:213_6: mahā kassapo pāvāya kusināraṃ addhānamagga paṭipanno hoti mahatābhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ
anya-e1202n:213_7: pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi tena kho pana samayena there cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbattā
anya-e1202n:213_8: devatā tasmiṃ samāgame theraṃ adisvā kuhinnu kho amhākaṃ kulupaga theroti āvajjento
anya-e1202n:213_9: antarāmaggapaṭipannaṃ disvā amhākaṃ kulupaga there avaṇdite citako mā pajjalitthāti adhiṭṭhihiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:214_0: Atha kho cattāro mallapāmokkhā sīsaṃ nahātā ahatāni vatthāni nicatthā vī saṃratanasatikaṃ
anya-e1202n:214_1: caṇdanacitakaṃ ālimpessāmāti aṭṭhapi solasapi dvattiṃsāpi janā hutvā yamaka ukkayo
anya-e1202n:214_2: gahetvā tālavaṇeṭahi vijantā bhastāni dhamantā na sakkontiyeva aggiṃ gāhāpetuṃ. Atha
anya-e1202n:214_3: kho kosinārakā mallā citakassa apajjalana kāraṇaṃ āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ pucchitvaṃ
anya-e1202n:214_4: devatānaṃ abhippāyaṃ sutvā mahākassapo kira bho pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ dasabalassa
anya-e1202n:214_5: pāde vaṇdissāmīti āgacchati tasmiṃ kira anāgate citako na pajjalati kīdiso bhoso
anya-e1202n:214_6: bhikkhu kālo odāto dīgho rasso evarūpe nāma bho bhikkhumhi ṭhito kiṃ dasabalassa
anya-e1202n:214_7: parinibbānaṃ nāmāti deci gaṇdhamālādi hatthā paṭipathaṃ gacchiṃsu keci vīthiyo vicittā
anya-e1202n:214_8: katvā āgamanamaggaṃ olokayamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo yena kusinārā
anya-e1202n:214_9: makūṭabaṇdhanaṃ nāma mallānaṃ cetiyaṃ, yena bhagavato citako tenupasaṅkami. Upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e1202n:214_10: ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā tikkhattuṃ citakaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā āvajjentova sallakkhesi-imasmiṃ
anya-e1202n:214_11: ṭhāne pādāti tate pādasamīpe ṭhatvā abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
anya-e1202n:214_12: arasahassa patimaṇḍitā dasabalassa pādā saddhiṃ kappāsa paṭalehi pañcadussayugasatāni
anya-e1202n:214_13: suvaṇṇadoṇiṃ vaṇdanacitakañca dvedhā katvā mayhaṃ uttamaṅge sirasi patiṭṭhahantūti
anya-e1202n:214_14: adhiṭṭhāsi saha adhiṭṭhāna cittena tāni dussayugādini dvedhā katvā valāhakantarā
anya-e1202n:215_0: Thero vikasita rattapaduma sadise hatthe pasāretvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇe satthu pāde yāva
anya-e1202n:215_1: gopphakā bāḷhaṃ gahetva attano siravare patiṭṭhāpesi mahājano taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā
anya-e1202n:215_2: ekappahāre neva mahānādaṃ nadi. Gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā yathāruciṃ vaṇdi. Eva pana
anya-e1202n:215_3: therena ca mahājanena ca tehi ca pañcahi bhikkhusatehi vaṇdita mattetherassa hatthato
anya-e1202n:215_4: muñcitvā alattaka vaṇṇāni bhagavato pādatālāni dāruādisu kiñci acāletvāva yathāṭṭhāne
anya-e1202n:215_5: patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Bhagavato pādesu nikkhamantesu vā pavisantesu vā kappāsaaṃsu vā dasātantu
anya-e1202n:215_6: vā telabiṇdu vā dārukhaṇḍaṃ vā ṭhānā calitaṃ nāma nāhosi. Sabbaṃ yathāṭṭhāne ṭhitameva
anya-e1202n:215_7: ahosi. Uṭṭhahitvā pana atthaṅgate caṇde viya sūriye viya ca tathāgatassa pādesu antarahitesu
anya-e1202n:215_8: mahājano mahākaṇditaṃ kaṇdi. Parinibbutakālato adhikataraṃ kāruññaṃ ahosi atha kho
anya-e1202n:215_9: devātānubhāvena panesa citake samantato ekappahāreneva pajjali. Jhāyamānassa bhagavato
anya-e1202n:215_10: sarīrassa chavi camma maṃsādīnaṃ neva chārikāmattampi antamaso paññāyittha na masi,
anya-e1202n:215_11: sumana makula sadisā pana dhotamutta sadisā suvaṇṇasadisā ca dhātuyo avasissiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:216_0: Dīghāyuka buddhānañhi sarīraṃ suvaṇṇakkhaṇdhasadisaṃ ekaghanameva hoti. Bhagavā pana
anya-e1202n:216_1: ahaṃna ciraṃ ṭhatvā ṭhatvā parinibbāyāmi. Mayhaṃ sāsanaṃ na tāva sabbattha vitthāritaṃ,
anya-e1202n:216_2: tasmā parinibbutassapi me sāsasamattampi dhātuṃ gahetvā attano attano vasanaṭṭhāne
anya-e1202n:216_3: cetiyaṃ katvā paricaranto mahājano saggaparāyano hotiti dhātūnaṃ vikiraṇaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n:216_4: Kati panassa dhātuyo vippakiṇṇā, kati na vippakiṇṇāti catasso dāṭṭhā, dve akkhakā,
anya-e1202n:216_5: uṇhīsanti imā sattadhātuyo na vippakiṇṇā. Sesā vippakiriṃsu. Tattha sabbakhuddakā
anya-e1202n:216_6: dhātu sāsapa bījamattā ahosi mahādhātu majjhe bhinna taṇḍulamattā. Atimahatī majjhe
anya-e1202n:217_0: Daḍḍhe kho pana bhagavato sarīre ākāsato aggabāhumattāpi jaṅghamattāpi tālakkhaṇdhamattāpi
anya-e1202n:217_1: udakadhārā patitvā citakaṃ nibbāpesi na kevalaṃ ākāsatoyeva parivāretvā ṭhitasālarukkhānampi
anya-e1202n:217_2: sākhattara viṭapantarehi udakadhārā nikkhamitvā nibbāpesuṃ, bhagavato citako mahanto,
anya-e1202n:217_3: samantā pathaviṃ bhiṇditvā taṃṅgalasīsamattā udakavaṭṭi eḷika vaṭaṃsaka sadisā gantvā
anya-e1202n:217_4: citakameva gaṇhi mallarājāno ca suvaṇṇaghaṭe rajataghaṭe ca pūretvā ābhata nānāgaṇdhodakena
anya-e1202n:217_5: suvaṇṇa rajatamayehi aṭṭhadantakehi vikiritvā caṇdanacitakaṃ nibbāpesuṃ. Tattha citake
anya-e1202n:217_6: jhayamāne parivāretvā ṭhita sālarukkhānaṃ sākhantarehi viṭapantarehi pattantarehi
anya-e1202n:217_7: ca jāle uggacchante pattaṃ vā sākhā vā daḍḍhā nāma natthi kipillikāpi makkaṭakāpi
anya-e1202n:218_0: Ākāsato patita udakadhārāsupi sālarukkhehi nikkhantौdakadhārāsupi pathaviṃ bhiṇditvā
anya-e1202n:218_1: nikkhanta udakadhārāsupi dhammatāva pamāṇaṃ evaṃ citakaṃ nibbāpetvā pana mallarājāno
anya-e1202n:218_2: saṇthāgāre catujātigaṇdha paribhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā lāja pañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā upari
anya-e1202n:218_3: celavitānaṃ baṇdhāpetvā suvaṇṇatārakāhi khacetvā tattha gaṇdhadāma mālādāma ratanadāmāni
anya-e1202n:218_4: olambetvā satthāgārato yāva makuṭa baṇdhana saṅkhātā sīsappasādhana maṅgalasālā tāva
anya-e1202n:218_5: ubhohi passehi sāṇikilañja parikkhepaṃ kāretvā upari celavitānaṃ baṇdhāpetvā suvaṇṇatārakāhi
anya-e1202n:218_6: khacetvā tatthāpi gaṇdhadāma mālādāma ratanadāmāni olambetvā maṇidaṇḍehi pañcavaṇṇadhaje
anya-e1202n:218_7: ussapetvā samantā dhajapatākā pirikkhipitvā sittasammaṭṭhāsu vīthisu kadaliyo puṇṇaghaṭe
anya-e1202n:218_8: ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍadīpikā jāletvā alaṅkata hatthikkhaṇdhe sahadhātūhi suvaṇṇadoṇiṃ
anya-e1202n:218_9: ṭhapetvā mālāgaṇdhādīhi pūjetvā sādhukīḷaṃ kīḷantā antonagaraṃ pavesetvā saṇthāgāre
anya-e1202n:218_10: sarabhamaya pallaṅke ṭhapetvā upari setacchattaṃ dhārayitvā satti hatthehi purisehi
anya-e1202n:218_11: parikkhipāpetvā hatthīhi kumbhena kumbhaṃ paharantehi parikkhipāpetvā tato assehi
anya-e1202n:218_12: gīvāya gīvaṃ paharantehi tato rathehi āṇikoṭiyā āṇikoṭiṃ pahantehi tato yodhehi bāhūhi
anya-e1202n:218_13: bāhuṃ paharantehi tesaṃ pariyante koṭiyā koṭiṃ paharamānehi dhanūhi parikkhipāpesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:219_0: Iti samantā yojanappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ sannāhagacchitaṃ viya katvā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:219_1: Kasmā panete evamakaṃsūti. Ito purimesu dvīsu sattāhesu te bhikkhusaṅghassa ṭhānanisajjokāsaṃ
anya-e1202n:219_2: karontā khādanīya bhojanīyaṃ saṃvidahantā sādhukīḷāya okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu tato tesaṃ
anya-e1202n:219_3: ahosi - imaṃ sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷaṃ kīḷissāma. Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ amhākaṃ
anya-e1202n:219_4: pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā kocīdeva āgantvā dhātuyo gaṇhayya-tasmā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā kīḷissāmāti tena te evamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:220_0: Atha kho assosi kho rājā māgadho ajātasattu bhagavā kira kusinārāyaṃ parinibbutoti
anya-e1202n:220_1: kathaṃ assosi paṭhamamevassa amaccā sutvā cintayiṃsu? Satthā nāma parinibbuto, na
anya-e1202n:220_2: so sakkā puna āhariṃtu pothujjanika saddhāya pana amhākaṃ raññā sadiso natthi. Sace
anya-e1202n:220_3: esa imināva niyāmena suṇissati, hadayamassa eḷissati rājā kho panambhehi anurakkhitabboti
anya-e1202n:220_4: te tisso suvaṇṇadoṇiyo āharitvā catumadhurassa pūretvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā etadavocuṃ.
anya-e1202n:220_5: Dve amhehi supinako diṭṭho tassa paṭighātatthaṃ tumhehi dukūlapaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā yathā
anya-e1202n:220_6: nāsāpuṭamattaṃ paññāyati evaṃ catumadhuradoṇiyaṃ nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Rājā atthavarakānaṃ
anya-e1202n:220_7: vacanaṃ sutvā evaṃ hotu tātā’ti sampaṭicchitvā tathā akāsi.
anya-e1202n:221_0: Atheko amacco alaṅkāraṃ omuñcitvā kese parikiriya yāya disāya satthā parinibbuto
anya-e1202n:221_1: tadabhimukho hutvā añjalimpaggayha rājānaṃ āha- devamaraṇato muñcanakasatto nāma
anya-e1202n:221_2: natthi. Amhākaṃ āyuvaddhakenā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ puññakkhettaṃ abhisekapiṭṭhikā bhagavā
anya-e1202n:221_3: satthā kusinārāyaṃ parinibbutoti rājā sutvā visaññī jāto catumadhuradoṇi usumaṃ muñci
anya-e1202n:221_4: rājānaṃ ukkhipitvā dutiyāya doṇiyā nipajjāpesuṃ so saññaṃ labhitvā tāta kiṃ vadathāti
anya-e1202n:221_5: pucchi. Satthā mahārāja parinibbutoti, puna visaññi jāto catumadhuradoṇiṃ usumaṃ
anya-e1202n:221_6: muñci. Atha naṃ tatopi ukkhipitvā tatiyāya doṇiyā nipajjāpesuṃ so puna saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā
anya-e1202n:221_7: tāta kiṃ vadathāti pucchi satthā mahārāja parinibbutoti. Rājā puna visaññī jāto ca
anya-e1202n:222_0: Atha naṃ tatopi ukkhipitvā nahāpetvā matthake ghaṭehi udakaṃ āsiñciṃsu rājā saññaṃ
anya-e1202n:222_1: paṭilabhitvā āsanā uṭṭhāya gaṇdhaparibhāvīte maṇivaṇṇakese suvaṇṇaphalaka vaṇṇāya
anya-e1202n:222_2: piṭṭhiyaṃ pakiritvā pavāḷaṅguravaṇṇāhi suvaṭṭitaṅgulīhi suvaṇṇabimbaka vaṇṇaṃ uraṃ
anya-e1202n:222_3: saṃsibbanto viya gahetvā paridevamāno ummattakaveseneva antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇo so alaṅkata
anya-e1202n:222_4: nāṭaka parivuto nagarā nikkhamma jīvakambavanaṃ gantvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnena bhagavatā
anya-e1202n:222_5: dhammo desito taṃ oloketvā bhagavā sabbaññu nanu me imasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā dhammaṃ
anya-e1202n:222_6: desayittha tumhe sokasallaṃ vinodayittha. Tumhe mayhaṃ sokasallaṃ nīharittha. Ahaṃ
anya-e1202n:222_7: tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gato. Idāni pana me paṭivacanampi na detha bhagavāti punappuna paridevitvā
anya-e1202n:222_8: nanu bhagavā ahaṃ aññadā evarūpe kāle tuṭṭhe mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā jambudīpatale
anya-e1202n:222_9: cārikaṃ carathāti suṇāma idāni pana ahaṃ tumhākaṃ ananurūpaṃ ayuttaṃ pavattiṃ suṇāmīti
anya-e1202n:222_10: evamādīni ca vattā saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi bhagavato guṇaṃ anussaritvā cintesi mama
anya-e1202n:222_11: paridevite neva na sijjhati. Dasabalassa dhātuyo āharāpessāmiti mallarājunaṃ dūtañca paṇṇañca pāhesi.
anya-e1202n:223_0: Bhagavāpi khattiyo, ahampi khattiyo, ahampi arahāmi bhagavato sarīrānaṃ thūpañca
anya-e1202n:223_1: mahañca kāretunti pesetvā pana sace dassanti suṇdaraṃ, no ce dassanti āharaṇupāyena
anya-e1202n:223_2: āharissāmīti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā sayampi nikkhantoyeva yathā ca ajātasattu
anya-e1202n:223_3: evaṃ vesāliyaṃ licchavirājāno kapilavatthumhi sakyarājāno allakappake bulayo rāmagāmake
anya-e1202n:223_4: koḷiyā veṭhadīpake brāhmaṇo pāvāyañca mallā dūtaṃ pesetvā sayampi caturaṅginiyā senāya
anya-e1202n:223_5: nikkhamiṃsuyeva tattha pāceyyakā sabbehi āsannatarā kusinārāto tigāvutantare nagare
anya-e1202n:223_6: vasanti. Bhagavāpi pāvaṃ pavisitvā kusināraṃ gato. Mahāparihārā panete rājāno parihārā
anya-e1202n:223_7: kāreṃntāva pacchato jātā. Te sabbepi sattanagaravāsino āgattvā amhākaṃ dhātuyo vā
anya-e1202n:223_8: dentu yuddhaṃ vāti kusinārā nagaraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:224_1: sāsanaṃ pahiṇimha na gattvā ānayimha. Satthā pasa sayameva āgantvā sāsanaṃ pesetvā
anya-e1202n:224_2: amhe pakkosapesi tumhepi kho pana yaṃ tumhākaṃ gāmakkhette ratanaṃ uppajjati na taṃ
anya-e1202n:224_3: amhākaṃ detha sadevake loke buddharatanasamaṃ ratanaṃ nāma natthi, evarūpaṃ. Uttamaṃ
anya-e1202n:224_4: ratanaṃ labhitvā mayaṃ na dassamāti evaṃ te kalahaṃ vaḍḍhetvā na kho pana tumhehiyeva
anya-e1202n:224_5: mātu thanato khiraṃ pītaṃ, amhehipi pītaṃ tumheyeva purisā amhe na purisā hotu hotūti
anya-e1202n:224_6: aññamaññaṃ ahaṃkāraṃ katvā sāsana paṭisāsanaṃ pesentā aññamaññaṃ mānagajjitaṃ gajjiṃsu
anya-e1202n:224_7: yuddhe pana sati kosinārakānaṃyeva jayo abhavissa, kasmā dhātupāsanatthaṃ āgatā devatā tesaṃ pakkhāahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:225_0: Tato doṇo brāhmaṇo imaṃ vivādaṃ sutvā ete rājāno bhagavate parinibbutaṭṭhāne vividaṃ
anya-e1202n:225_1: karonti na kho panetaṃ patirūpaṃ alaṃ iminā kalahena cūpasamessāmi na nti uṇṇatappadese
anya-e1202n:225_2: ṭhatvā dvebhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ doṇagajjitaṃ nāma avoca tattha paṭṭhamakabhāṇavāre tāva
anya-e1202n:225_3: ekapadampi te na jāniṃsu dutiyaka bhāṇavāra pariyosāne’ācariyassa viya bhosaddo,
anya-e1202n:225_4: ācariyassa viya bho saddo’ti sabbe nī ravā ahesuṃ sakalajambudīpatale kira kulaghare
anya-e1202n:225_5: jāto yebhuyyena tassa na antevāsiko nāma natthi atha so te attano vacanaṃ sutvā tuṇhībhūte
anya-e1202n:234_0: Tatrāyamattho “amhākaṃ buddho ahu khantivādo“ti buddhabhūmiṃ appatvāpi pāramiyo pūrento
anya-e1202n:234_1: khantivāda tāpasakāle dhammapālakumāra kāle chaddantahatthikāle bhūridatta nāgarāja
anya-e1202n:234_2: kāle campeyya nāgarāja kāle saṅkhapāla nāgarāja kāle mahākapikāle aññesupi bahūsu
anya-e1202n:234_3: jātakesu paresu kopaṃ akatvā khantimeva akāsi. Khantimeva vaṇṇayi, kimaṅga pana etarahi
anya-e1202n:234_4: iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu tādilakkhaṇaṃ patto sabbathāpi amhākaṃ buddho khantivādo ahosi.
anya-e1202n:235_0: Tassa evaṃ vidhassa na hi sādhaya uttamapuggalassa sarīrabhaṅge siyā sampahāro, “na
anya-e1202n:235_1: hi sādhayanti“na hi sādhu ayaṃ, “sarīrabhaṅgeti sarīra bhaṅganimittaṃ dhātukoṭṭhāsahetūti
anya-e1202n:235_2: attho “siyā sampahāro“ti āyudha sampahāro na hi sādhu siyāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Sabbeva
anya-e1202n:235_3: bhonto sahitā“ti sabbeva bhavanto sahitā bhotha mā bhijjittha. “Samaggāti“ kāyena
anya-e1202n:235_4: vācāya ca ekasannipātā ekavacanā samaggā bhotha “sammodamānā“ti cittenāpi aññamaññaṃ
anya-e1202n:235_5: modamānā bhotha.’Karomaṭṭhabhāge“ti bhagavatā sarīrāni aṭṭhabhāge karoma. “Cakkhumato“ti
anya-e1202n:235_6: pañcahi cakkhuhī cakkhutā buddhassa, na kevalaṃ tumheyeva bahujjano pasanno tesu
anya-e1202n:235_7: ekopi laddhu ayutto nāma natthiti bahuṃ kāraṇaṃ vatvā saññāpesi.
anya-e1202n:236_0: Atha sabbepi rājāno evamāhaṃsu-tena hi brāhmaṇa tvaññeva bhagavato sarīrāni aṭṭhadhā
anya-e1202n:236_1: samaṃ suvibhattaṃ vibhajāhīti. Evaṃ bhoti kho doṇo brāhmaṇo tesaṃ rājūnaṃ paṭissutvā
anya-e1202n:237_0: Tatrāyamanukkamo doṇo kira tesaṃ paṭissutvā suvaṇṇadoṇiṃ vivarāpesi. Rājāno āgantvā
anya-e1202n:237_1: doṇiyaṃ yevatā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dhātuyo disvā bhagavā sabbaññu pubbe mayaṃ tumhākaṃ dvattiṃsa
anya-e1202n:237_2: lakkhaṇa patimaṇḍitaṃ chabbaṇṇabuddharasmikhacitaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ addasāma
anya-e1202n:237_3: idāni pana suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dhātuyova avasiṭṭhā jātā, na yuttamidaṃ bhagavā tumhākanti
anya-e1202n:237_4: parideviṃsu. Brāhmaṇo tasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃ gahetvā
anya-e1202n:237_5: veṭhantare ṭhapesi atha pacchā samaṃ suvibhattaṃ vibhaji. Sabbāpi dhātuyo pākatika
anya-e1202n:237_6: nāḷiyā soḷasa nāḷiyo ahosuṃ. Ekeka nagaravāsino dve dve nāḷiyo labhiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:238_0: Brāhmaṇassa pana dhātuyo vibhajantasseva sakkodevānamiṇdo kena nu kho sadevakassa
anya-e1202n:238_1: lokassa kaṅkhācchedanāya catusaccakathāya paccayabhūtā bhagavato dakkhiṇadāṭhā gahitāti
anya-e1202n:238_2: olokento brāhmaṇena gahitāti disvā brāhmaṇo dāṭhāya anucchavikaṃ sakkāraṃ kātuṃ na
anya-e1202n:238_3: sakkhissati gaṇhāmi nanti veṭhantarato gahetvā suvaṇṇa caṅgoṭake ṭhapetvā devalokaṃ
anya-e1202n:238_4: netvā cuḷāmaṇī cetiye patiṭṭhāpesi brāhmaṇopi dhātuyo vibhajitvā dāṭhaṃ apassanto
anya-e1202n:238_5: kena me ṭhā gahitāti pucchitumpi nāsakkhi. Nanu tayā dhātuyo vibhajitā, kiṃ tvaṃ
anya-e1202n:238_6: paṭhamaṃyeva attano dhātūhi atthibhāvaṃ na aññāsīti, attani dosāropanaṃ sampassamāno
anya-e1202n:239_0: Tato ayaṃ suvaṇṇakumbhopi dhātugatikoyeva yena tathāgatassa dhātuyo minitā. Imassāhaṃ
anya-e1202n:239_1: thūpaṃ karissāmīti cintetvā imaṃ me bhonto kumbhaṃ dadantūti āha tato rājāno brāhmaṇassa
anya-e1202n:239_2: kumbhamadaṃsu pipphalivaniyāpi kho moriyā bhagavato parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā bhagavāpi
anya-e1202n:239_3: khattiyo, mayampi khattiyo mayampi, arahāma labhituṃ bhagavato sarīrānaṃ bhāganti
anya-e1202n:239_4: dūtaṃ pesetvā yuddha sajjā nikkhamitvā āgatā tesaṃ rājāno evamāhaṃsu - natthi bhagavato
anya-e1202n:239_5: sarīrānaṃ bhāgo, vibhattāni bhagavato sarīrāni ito aṅgāraṃ garathāti. Te tato aṅgāraṃ hariṃsu.
anya-e1202n:240_0: Atha kho rājā ajātasattu kusinārāya ca rājagahassa ca antare pañcavīsati yojanamaggaṃ
anya-e1202n:240_1: aṭṭha usabhavitthataṃ samatalaṃ kāretvā sādisaṃ mallarājāno makuṭabaṇdhanassa ca
anya-e1202n:240_2: saṇthāgārassa ca antare pūjaṃ kāresuṃ tādisaṃ pañcavīsatiyojanepi magge pūjā kāretvā
anya-e1202n:240_3: lokassa anukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ sabbattha antarāpaṇe pasāretvā suvaṇṇadoṇiyaṃ pakkhittadhātuyo
anya-e1202n:240_4: sattipañjarena parikkhipāpetvā attano vijite pañcayojanasata parimaṇḍale manusse sannipātāpesi.
anya-e1202n:241_0: Te dhātuyo gahetvā kusinārāto dhātukīḷaṃ kīḷantā nikkhamitvā yattha yattha vaṇṇavantāni
anya-e1202n:241_1: pupphāni passanti, tattha tattha dhātuyo satti antare ṭhapetvā tesaṃ pupphānaṃ khīṇakāle
anya-e1202n:241_2: gacchanti. Rathassa dhuraṭṭhānaṃ pacchimaṭṭhāne sampatte satta divase sādhukīḷaṃ
anya-e1202n:241_3: kīḷanti evaṃ dhātuyo gahetvā āgacchantānaṃ sattavassāni sattamāsāni satta ca divasāni
anya-e1202n:241_4: vitivattāni micchādiṭṭhikā samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbuta kālato paṭṭhāya balakkārena
anya-e1202n:241_5: sādhukīḷikāya upaddutamhā, sabbe no kammantā naṭṭhāti ujjhāyantā manaṃ padūsetvā
anya-e1202n:241_6: chaḷāsītisahassamattā apāye nibbattā, khīṇāsava āvajjitvā mahājano manaṃ padūsetvā
anya-e1202n:241_7: apāye nibbattoti sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ disvā dhātu āharaṇupāyaṃ karissāmāti tassa santikaṃ
anya-e1202n:241_8: gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā dhātu āharaṇupāyaṃ kārohi mahārājāti āhaṃsu. Sakko āha
anya-e1202n:241_9: “puthujjano nāma ajātasattunā samo saddho natthi, na so mama vacanaṃ karissati api
anya-e1202n:241_10: ca kho māravibhisakasadisaṃ vibhīsakaṃ dassessāmi yakkha gāhaka khipanaka arocake
anya-e1202n:241_11: karissāmi tumhe ’mahārāja amanussā kupitā, dhātuyo āharāpethāti’. Vadeyyātha evaṃ
anya-e1202n:241_12: so āharāpessatīti. Atha kho sakko taṃ sabbaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1202n:242_0: Therāpi rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mahārāja amanussā kupitaṃ, dhātuyo āharāpehīti bhaṇiṃsu
anya-e1202n:242_1: rājā na tāva bhante mayhaṃ cittaṃ tussati. Evaṃ santepi āharatūti āha sattame divase
anya-e1202n:242_2: dhātuyo āhariṃsu. Evaṃ āhatadhātuyo gahetvā rājā rājagahe thupamakāsi itarepi rājāno
anya-e1202n:242_3: attano attano balānurūpena nīharitvā sakasakaṭṭhāne thūpamakaṃsu. Doṇipi brāhmaṇo
anya-e1202n:243: Eko thūpo rājagahe - eko vesāliyā pure,
anya-e1202n:245: Eko thūpo rāmagāme - eko ca veṭhadīpake,
anya-e1202n:246: Eko pāceyyake malle - eko ca kusinārake;
anya-e1202n:247: Ye te sārīrikā thūpā - jambuvadīpe patiṭṭhitā;
anya-e1202n:254_0: 10. Evaṃ patiṭṭhitesu pana thūpesu mahākassapatthero dhātūnaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā ajātasattuṃ
anya-e1202n:254_1: upasaṅkamitvā mahārāja ekaṃ dhātunidhānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiti āha sādhu bhante nidhānakammaṃ
anya-e1202n:254_2: tāva mama hotu, dhātuyo pana kathaṃ āharāpemiti. Na mahārāja dhātu āharaṇaṃ tuyhaṃ
anya-e1202n:254_3: bhāro, amhākaṃ bhāroti. Sādhu bhante tumhe dhātuyo āharatha. Ahaṃ dhātunidhānaṃ karissāmīti.
anya-e1202n:254_4: Thero tesaṃ tesaṃ rājakulānaṃ paricaraṇamattakameva ṭhapetvā sesedhātuyo āhari.
anya-e1202n:255_0: Rāmagāme pana dhātuyo nāgā gaṇhiṃsu tāsaṃ antarāyo natthi, anāgate laṅkādīpe mahāvihāre
anya-e1202n:255_1: mahācetiyamhi nidhiyissa nīti. Tā na āharittha, sesehi sattahi nagarehi āharitvā
anya-e1202n:255_2: rājagahassa pācīna dakkhina disābhāge ṭhapetvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne yo pāsāṇo atthi, so
anya-e1202n:255_3: antaradhāyatu, paṃsu suvisuddhā hotu, udakañca mā uṭṭhahatūti adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n:256_0: Rājā taṃ ṭhānaṃ khaṇāpetvā tato uddhaṭa paṃsunā iṭṭhikā kāretvā asīti mahāsāvakānaṃ
anya-e1202n:256_1: thūpe kāreti idha rājā kiṃ kārehīti pucchantānampi mahāsāvakānaṃcetiyā nīti vadanti
anya-e1202n:256_2: na koci dhātunidhānabhāvaṃ jānāti asītihatthagambhīre pana tasmiṃ padese jāte heṭṭhā
anya-e1202n:256_3: lobhasattharaṃ sattharāpetvā tattha thūpārāme cetiya gharappamāṇaṃ tambalohamayaṃ
anya-e1202n:256_4: gehaṃ kārāpetvā aṭṭhaṭṭha hari caṇdanādimaye karaṇḍe ca thūpe ca kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n:257_0: Atha kho bhagavato dhātuyo haricaṇdana karaṇḍe pakkhipitvā taṃ haricaṇdanaṃ karaṇḍaṃ
anya-e1202n:257_1: aññasmiṃ haricaṇdana karaṇḍe tampi aññasminti evaṃ aṭṭha haricaṇdana karaṇḍe ekato
anya-e1202n:257_2: katvā eteneva upāyena aṭṭha karaṇḍe aṭṭhasu haricaṇdana thūpesu aṭṭha haricaṇdanathūpe
anya-e1202n:257_3: aṭṭhasu lohitacaṇdana karaṇḍesu, aṭṭha lohitacaṇdanakaraṇḍe aṭṭhasu lohitacaṇdanathūpesu,
anya-e1202n:257_4: aṭṭhalohita caṇdanathūpe aṭṭhasu dantakaraṇḍesu, aṭṭha dantakaraṇḍe aṭṭhasu dantathūpesu,
anya-e1202n:257_5: aṭṭhadantathūpe aṭṭhasusabba ratanakaraṇḍesu, aṭṭha sabba ratanakaraṇḍe aṭṭhasu sabbaratanathūpesu,
anya-e1202n:257_6: aṭṭha sabbaratana thūpe aṭṭhasu suvaṇṇakaraṇḍesu. Aṭṭhasuvaṇṇakaraṇḍe aṭṭhasu suvaṇṇathūpesu,
anya-e1202n:257_7: aṭṭhasuvaṇṇathūpe aṭṭhasurajatakaraṇḍesu, aṭṭha rajatakaraṇḍe aṭṭhasu rajatathūpese
anya-e1202n:257_8: aṭṭha rajatathūpe aṭṭhasu maṇikaraṇḍesu aṭṭhamaṇikareṇḍaaṭṭhasuvaṇṇathūpesu, aṭṭha
anya-e1202n:257_9: maṇithūpe aṭṭhasu lohitaṅka karaṇḍesu, aṭṭhalohitaṅka karaṇḍe aṭṭhasu lohitaṅkathūpesu,
anya-e1202n:257_10: aṭṭha lohitaṅkathūpe aṭṭhasu masāragallathūpesu, aṭṭha masāragallathūpe aṭṭhasu phalika
anya-e1202n:257_11: karaṇḍesu, aṭṭha phaḷika karaṇḍe aṭṭhasu phaḷikathūpesu pakkhipi sabba uparimaṃ phaḷikacetiyaṃ
anya-e1202n:258_0: Tassa uparisabbaratanamayaṃ gehaṃ kāresi tassa upari suvaṇṇamayaṃ, tassa upari rajatamayaṃ,
anya-e1202n:258_1: tassa upari tambalohamayaṃ gehaṃ kāresi tattha sabbaratanamayaṃ vālukaṃ okiritvā
anya-e1202n:258_2: jalaja thalaja pupphānaṃ sahassāni vippakiritvā addhacchaṭṭhāni jātakasatāni āsīti
anya-e1202n:258_3: mahāthere suddhodana mahārājānaṃ mahāmāyādeviṃ satta sahajāte sabbānetāni suvaṇṇamayāneva
anya-e1202n:258_4: kāresi pañcapañcasate suvaṇṇarajatamaye puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapāpesi pañcasuvaṇṇadhajasate
anya-e1202n:258_5: pañcasate suvaṇṇadīpake ca kārāpetvā sugaṇdhatelassa pūretvā tesu dukūlavaṭṭiyo ṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n:259_0: Athāyasmā mahākassapo mālā mā milāyantu. Gaṇdhā mā vinassantu, dīpā mā vijjhāyantūti
anya-e1202n:259_1: adhiṭṭhahitvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭaakkharāni chiṇdāpesi. Anāgate piyadāso nāma kumāro chattaṃ
anya-e1202n:259_2: ussāpetvā asoko nāma dhammarājā bhavissati so imaṃ dhātuyo vitthārikā karissatīti
anya-e1202n:259_3: rājā sabbapasādhanehi pūjetvā ādito paṭṭhāya dvāraṃ pidahanto nikkhami tambalohadvāraṃ
anya-e1202n:259_4: pidahitvā āviñjana rajjuyaṃ kuñcikamuddikaṃ baṇdhi tattheva mahantaṃ maṇikkhaṇdhaṃ
anya-e1202n:259_5: ṭhapesi anāgate daḷiddarājāno imaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā dhātūnaṃ sakkāraṃ karontūti akkharāni chiṇdāpesī.
anya-e1202n:260_0: Sakko devarājā vissakammaṃ āmantetvā’tāta, ajātasattunā dhātunidhānaṃ kataṃ. Ettha
anya-e1202n:260_1: ārakkhaṃ ṭhapehi’ti pahiṇi so āgantvā vāḷasaṅghāṭayantaṃ yojesi. Kaṭṭharūpakāni tasmiṃ
anya-e1202n:260_2: dhātugabbhe phaḷikavaṇṇa khagge gahetvā vātasadisena vegena anupariyāyantaṃ yojetvā
anya-e1202n:260_3: ekāya eva āṇivā baṇdhitvā samantato giñjaka vasathākārena silāparikkhepaṃ katvā upari
anya-e1202n:260_4: ekāya pidahitvā paṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā bhūmiṃ samaṃ katvā tassupari pāsāṇathūpaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n:262_0: 11. Evaṃ niṭṭhite dhātunidhāne yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā thero parinibbuto, rājāpi yathākammaṃ
anya-e1202n:262_1: gato, tepi manussā kālakatā, aparabhāge piyadāso kumāro chattaṃ ussāpetvā asoko nāma
anya-e1202n:262_2: dhamma rājā hutvā tā dhātuyo gahetvā jambudīpe caturāsītiyā cetiya sahassesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n:262_3: Kathaṃ biṇdusārassa kira ekasataṃ puttā ahesuṃ te sabbe asoko attanā saddhiṃ ekamātikaṃ
anya-e1202n:262_4: tissa kumāraṃ ṭhapetvā ghātesi. Ghātento cattāri vassāni anabhisitto rajjaṃ kāretvā
anya-e1202n:262_5: catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena tathāgatassa parinibbānato dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari
anya-e1202n:263_0: Abhisekānubhāvena imā rājiddhiyo āgatā mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhā yojanappamāṇe āṇā pavatti,
anya-e1202n:263_1: tathā upari ākāse, anotattadahato aṭṭhahi kājehi soḷasa pānīyaghaṭe divase divase
anya-e1202n:263_2: devatā āharanti. Yato sāsane uppannasaddho hutvā aṭṭha ghaṭe bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi
anya-e1202n:263_3: dve ghaṭe saṭṭhimattānaṃ tipiṭaka bhikkhunaṃ dveghaṭe aggamahesiyā asaṇdhimittāya
anya-e1202n:263_4: cattāro ghaṭe attanā paribhuñji. Devatā eva himavante nāgalatā dantakaṭṭha nāma atthi
anya-e1202n:263_5: siniddhā mudukaṃ rasavantaṃ, taṃ divase divase ābhiranti yena rañño ca aggamahesiyā
anya-e1202n:263_6: ca soḷasannaṃ nāṭakasahassānaṃ saṭṭhimattānaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ devasikaṃ dantapoṇakiccaṃ nipphajji.
anya-e1202n:264_0: Devasikamevassa devatā agadāmalakaṃ agadaharīṭakaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇañca gaṇdhasampannaṃ
anya-e1202n:264_1: ambapakkaṃ āharanti tathā chaddanta dahato pañcavaṇṇaṃ nivāsana pārupaṇaṃ, pītakavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:264_2: hatthapuñchanaka paṭṭaṃdibbañcajānakaṃ āharanti devasikameva panassa anulepagaṇdhaṃ
anya-e1202n:264_3: pārupanatthāya asuttamayikaṃ sumanapupphapaṭaṃ mahārahañca añjanaṃ nāgabhavanato
anya-e1202n:264_4: nāgarājāno āharanti. Chaddantadaheyeva uṭṭhitassa sālino nava cāha sahassāni divase
anya-e1202n:264_5: divase suvā āharanti. Mūsikā nitthusa kaṇe karonti ekopi khaṇḍataṇḍulo na hoti. Rañño
anya-e1202n:264_6: sabbaṭṭhānesu ayameva taṇḍulo paribhogaṃ gacchati. Madhumakkhikā madhuṃ karonti.
anya-e1202n:264_7: Kammārasālāsu acchā kūṭaṃ paharanti. Dīpikā cammāni cālenti karavīka sakuṇā āgattvā
anya-e1202n:265_0: Imāhi iddhīhi samannāgato rājāeka divasaṃ suvaṇṇa saṅkhalika baṇdhanaṃ pesetvā catunnaṃ
anya-e1202n:265_1: buddhānaṃ adhigata rūpadassanaṃ kappāyukaṃ mahākāḷa nāgarājānaṃ ānayitvā setacchattassa
anya-e1202n:265_2: heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā aneka satavaṇṇehi jalaja thalaja pupphehi suvaṇṇapupphehi
anya-e1202n:265_3: ca pūjaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkāra patimaṇḍitehi ca soḷasahi nāṭaka sahassehi samantato
anya-e1202n:265_4: parikkhipitvā anantañāṇassa tāva me saddhammavara cakkavattino sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e1202n:265_5: rūpaṃ imesaṃ akkhīnaṃ āpāthaṃ karohīti nibbattāsīti anubyañjana patimaṇḍitaṃ dvattiṃsa
anya-e1202n:265_6: mahā purisa lakkhaṇa sassirīkatāya vikasita kamalupphala puṇḍarīka patimaṇḍitamiva
anya-e1202n:265_8: bheda vicittavaṇṇaraṃsi vinaddha byāmappabhā parikkhepa vilāsitāya sañjhappabhānurāga
anya-e1202n:265_9: iṇdadhanu vijjullatā parikkhittamiva kanakagiri sikharaṃ nānāvirāga vimalaketumālā
anya-e1202n:265_11: buddharūpaṃ passanto sattadivasaṃ akkhipūjaṃ nāma akāsi
anya-e1202n:266_0: Rājā kira abhisekaṃ pāpuṇitvā tīṇiyeva saṃvaccharāni bāhiraka pāsaṇḍaṃ parigaṇhi
anya-e1202n:266_1: catutthe saṃvacchare buddhasāsane pasīdinaṃ brāhmaṇa jātiya pāsaṇḍānañca paṇḍaraṅga
anya-e1202n:267_0: Asoko pitarā pavattitaṃ dānaṃ attano antepure tatheva dadamāno ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare
anya-e1202n:267_1: ṭhito upasama paribāhirena ācārena bhuñjamāne asaṃyatiṇdriye avinita iriyāpathe disvā
anya-e1202n:267_2: cintesi īdisaṃ dānaṃ upaparikkhitvā yuttaṭṭhāne dātuṃ vaṭṭatiti evaṃ cintetvā amacce
anya-e1202n:267_3: āha. Gacchatha bhaṇe attano attano sādhusammate samaṇa brāhmaṇe antepuraṃ atiharatha,
anya-e1202n:267_4: dānaṃ dassāmāti amaccā sādhu devāti rañño paṭissutvā te te paṇḍaraṅga paribbājakājīvaka
anya-e1202n:267_5: nigaṇṭhādayo ānetvā ime mahārāja amhākaṃ arahantoti āhaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:268_0: Atha rājā antepure uccāvacāni āsanāni paññāpetva āgacchantūti vatvā āgatāgate āha
anya-e1202n:268_1: attano attano anurūpe āsane nisīdathāti ekacce bhaddapīṭhake ekacce phalakapīṭhakese
anya-e1202n:268_2: nisīdiṃsu. Taṃ disvā rājā natthi etesaṃ antesāroti ñatvā tesaṃ anurūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ
anya-e1202n:269_0: Evaṃ gacchante kāle eka divasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito addasa nigrodha sāmaṇeraṃ rājaṅgaṇena
anya-e1202n:269_1: gacchantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santiṇdriyaṃ iriyāpatha sampannaṃ. Ko panāyaṃ nigrodho nāma,
anya-e1202n:269_2: biṇdusāra rañño jeṭṭhaputtassa sumanarāja kumārassa putto. Tatrāyaṃ ānupubbī kathā-biṇdusāra
anya-e1202n:269_3: rañño kira dubbalakāleyeva asoka kumāro attanā laddhaṃ ujjenirajjaṃ pahāya āgantvā
anya-e1202n:269_4: sabbaṃ nagaraṃ attano hatthagataṃ katvā sumana rājakumāraṃ aggahesi.
anya-e1202n:270_0: Taṃ divasameva sumanassa rājakumārassa sumanā nāma devī paripuṇṇagabbhā ahosi. Sā
anya-e1202n:270_1: aññātakavesena nikkhamitvā avidūre aññataraṃ caṇḍālagāmaṃ saṇdhāya gacchanti, jeṭṭhaka
anya-e1202n:270_2: caṇḍālassa gehato avidūre ekasmiṃ nigrodha rukkhe adhivatthāya devatāya ito sumaneti
anya-e1202n:270_3: vahantiyā saddaṃ sutvā tassā samīpaṃ gatā devatā attano ānubhāvena ekaṃ sālaṃ nimmiṇitvā
anya-e1202n:270_4: ettha vasāhiti padāsi. Sā taṃ sālaṃ pāvisi. Gatadivaseyeva puttaṃ vijāyi.
anya-e1202n:271_0: Sā tassa nigrodha devatāya pariggahitattā nigrodhotveva nāmaṃ akāsi. Jeṭṭhaka caṇḍālo
anya-e1202n:271_1: daṭṭhadivasatoppabhūti taṃ attano sāmidhītaraṃ viya maññamāno nibaddhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n:271_2: Rājadhītā tattha satta vassāni vasi. Nigrodhakumāropi sattavassiko jāto tadā mahāvaruṇatthero
anya-e1202n:271_3: nāma eko arahā dārakassa hetusampadaṃ disvā viharamāno sattavassikodāni dārako kālo
anya-e1202n:271_4: naṃ pabbājetunti cintetvā rājadhītayā ārocāpetvā nigrodhakumāraṃ pabbājesi. Kumāro
anya-e1202n:271_5: khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So ekadivasaṃ pātova sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā ācariyupajjhānaṃ
anya-e1202n:271_6: vattaṃ katvā pattacīvaramādāya mātuupāsikāya gehadvāraṃ gacchāmīti nikkhami mātu
anya-e1202n:271_7: nivesanaṭṭhānañcassa dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā nagaramajjhena gantvā pācīnadvārena
anya-e1202n:271_8: nikkhamitvā gantabbaṃ hoti tena ca samayena asoko dhammarājā pācīna disābhimukho
anya-e1202n:272_0: Taṃ khaṇaṃyeva sigrodho sāmaṇero rājaṅgaṇaṃ pāpuṇi santiṇdriyo santamānaso yugamattaṃ
anya-e1202n:272_1: pekkhamāno. Tena vuttaṃ. Ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito addasa nigrodhasāmaṇeraṃ rājaṅgaṇena
anya-e1202n:272_2: gacchantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santiṇdriyaṃ iriyāpatha sampannanti. Disvā panassa etadahosi?
anya-e1202n:272_3: Ayaṃ jano sabbopi vikkhittacittohantamagapaṭibhāgo, ayampana dārako avikkhittacitto
anya-e1202n:272_4: ativiyassa alokita vilokitaṃ sammiñjana pasāraṇañca sobhati, addhā etassa abbhantare
anya-e1202n:272_5: lokuttaradhammo bhavissatīti rañño sahadassaneneva sāmaṇere cittaṃ pasīdi. Pemaṃ
anya-e1202n:272_6: saṇṭhahi kasmā? Pubbe kira puñña karaṇakāle esa rañño jeṭṭhabhātā vāṇijako ahosi.
anya-e1202n:273_0: Atha rājā sañjātapemo sabahumāno sāmaṇeraṃ pakkosathāti amacce pesesi aticirāyatīti
anya-e1202n:273_1: puna dve tayo pesesi turitaṃ āgacchatūti sāmaraṇero attano pakatiyā eva agamāsi rājā
anya-e1202n:273_2: patirūpāsanaṃ ñatvā nisīdathāti āha. Ito cito ca oloketvā natthidāni añño bhikkhuti
anya-e1202n:273_3: samussita setacchattaṃ rājapaḷlaṅkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pattagahaṇatthāya rañño ākāraṃ
anya-e1202n:273_4: dassesi. Rājā taṃ pallaṅkaṃ samīpaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā evaṃ cintesi. Ajjevadāni ayaṃ
anya-e1202n:273_5: sāmaṇero imassa gehassa sāmiko bhavissati. Sāmaṇero rañño hatthe pattaṃ datvā pallaṅkaṃ abharuhitvā nisīdi.
anya-e1202n:274_0: Rājā attano atthāya sampāditaṃ sabbaṃ yāgu-kajjaka bhatta vikatiṃ upanāmesi. Sāmaṇero
anya-e1202n:274_1: attano yāpanamattameva sampaṭicchi. Bhattakiccāvasāne rājā āha satthārā tumhākaṃ
anya-e1202n:274_2: dinnovādaṃ jānāthāti jānami mahārāja ekadesenāti. Tāta, mayhampi naṃ kathehīti sādhu
anya-e1202n:274_3: mahārājāti rañño anurūpaṃ dhammapade appamāda vaggaṃ anumodanatthāya abhāsi.
anya-e1202n:275_0: Rājā pana appamādo amatapadaṃ, pamādo maccuno padanti sutva ca, aññātaṃ tāta pariyosāpehīti
anya-e1202n:275_1: āha anumodanāvasāne dvattiṃsa dhurabhattāni labhitvā puna divase dvattiṃsa bhikkhu
anya-e1202n:275_2: gahetvā rājantepuraṃ pavisitvā bhattakiccamakāsi rājā aññepi dvattiṃsa bhikkhu tumhehi
anya-e1202n:275_3: saddhiṃyeva bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantūti eteneva upāyena divase divase vaḍḍhāpente saṭṭhi
anya-e1202n:275_4: sahassānaṃ brāhmaṇa paribbājakānaṃ bhattaṃ upacchiṇditvā anto nivesane saṭṭhisahassānaṃ
anya-e1202n:275_5: bhikkhunaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi, nigrodhatthera gateneva pasādena, nigrodhattheropi
anya-e1202n:275_6: rājānaṃ saparisaṃ tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu ca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā buddhasāsane pothujjanikena
anya-e1202n:276_0: Puna rāja asokārāmaṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ kārapetvā saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ
anya-e1202n:276_1: paṭṭhapesi. Sakalajambudīpe caturāsītiyā nagarasahassesu caturāsīti vihārasahassāni
anya-e1202n:276_2: kārāpesi. Caturāsīti cetiyasahassa patimaṇḍitāni dhammeneva no adhammena, ekadivasaṃ
anya-e1202n:276_3: kira rājā asokārāme mahādānaṃ datvā saṭṭhisahassa saṅkhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe
anya-e1202n:276_4: nisajja saṅghaṃ catūhi pavcayehi pavāretvā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi bhante bhagavato desita
anya-e1202n:276_5: dhammo nāma kittako hotīti. Mahārāja nava aṅgāni, khaṇdato caturāsīti dhammakkhaṇdha sahassānīti.
anya-e1202n:277_0: Rājā dhamme pasīditvā ekekaṃ dhammakkhaṇdhaṃ ekekena vihārena pūjessāmīti ekadivasameva
anya-e1202n:277_1: channavuti koṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā amacce āṇāpesi. Etha bhaṇe ekekasmiṃ nagare ekamekaṃ
anya-e1202n:277_2: vihāraṃ kārentā caturāsītiyā nagarasahassesu caturāsīti vihārasahassāni kārāpethāti
anya-e1202n:277_3: sayañca asokārāme asoka mahāvihāratthāya kammaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n:278_0: Saṅgho iṇdaguttattheraṃ nāma mahiddhiyaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ navakammādhiṭṭhāyakaṃ
anya-e1202n:278_1: adāsi. Thero yaṃ yaṃ na niṭṭhāti taṃ taṃ attano ānubhāvena niṭṭhāpesi. Evaṃ tīhi
anya-e1202n:278_2: saṃvaccharehi vihārakammaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Ekadivasameva sabbanagarehi paṇṇāni āgamiṃsu
anya-e1202n:278_3: amaccā rañño ārocesuṃ. Niṭṭhitāni deva caturāsīti vihārasahassānīti atha rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
anya-e1202n:278_4: upasaṅkamitvā bhante mayā caturāsīti vihārasahassāni kāritāni dhātuyokuto labhissāmīti puca pucchi.
anya-e1202n:279_0: Mahārāja dhātunidhānaṃ nāma atthīti suṇoma. Na pana paññāyati asukāṭṭhāneti rājā
anya-e1202n:279_1: rājagahe cetiyaṃ bhiṇdāpetvā dhātuṃ apassanto paṭipākatiyaṃ kāretvā bhikkhu-bhikkhuniyo-upāsaka-upāsikāyoti
anya-e1202n:279_2: catasso parisā gahetvā vesāliṃ gato. Tatrāpi alabhitvā kapiḷavatthuṃ, tatrāpi alabhitvā
anya-e1202n:279_3: rāmagāmaṃ gato, rāmagāme nāgā cetiyaṃ bhiṇdituṃ na adaṃsu. Cetiye nipatita kuddālo
anya-e1202n:279_4: khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ hoti evaṃ tatrāpi alabhitvā allakappaṃ-pāvaṃ-kusināranti sabbattha
anya-e1202n:279_5: cetiyāti bhiṇditvā dhātuṃ alabhitvā paṭipākatikāni katvā rājagahaṃ gantvā catasso
anya-e1202n:279_6: parisā sannipātetvā atthi kenaci sutapubbaṃ asukaṭṭhāne nāma dhātu nidhānanti pucchi.
anya-e1202n:280_0: Tattheko visaṃvassa satiko thero asukaṭṭhāne dhātunidhānanti na jānāmi. Mayhaṃ pana
anya-e1202n:280_1: pitāmahatthero mayi sattavassikakāle mālācaṅgoṭakaṃ gāhāpetvā ehi sāmaṇera, asuka
anya-e1202n:280_2: gacchantare pāsānathūpo atthi, tattha gacchāmāti gantvā pūjetvā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ upadhāretuṃ
anya-e1202n:280_3: vaṭṭati sāmaṇeroti āha. Ahaṃ ettakameva jānāmi mahārājāti āha.
anya-e1202n:281_0: Rājā etadeva ṭhānanti vatvā gacche harāpetvā pāsāṇathūpaṃ paṃsuñca apanetvā heṭṭhā
anya-e1202n:281_1: sudhābhūmiṃ addasa. Tato sudhañca iṭṭhakāyo ca harāpetvā anupubbena pariveṇā oruyha
anya-e1202n:281_2: satta ratanavālikaṃ asīti hatthāni ca kaṭṭharūpāni samparivattantāni addasa. So yakkha
anya-e1202n:281_3: dāsake pakkosāpetvā balikammaṃ kāretvāpi neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ pannanto devatā namassamāno
anya-e1202n:281_4: ahaṃ imā dhātuyo gahetvā caturāsītiyā vihārasahassesu nidahitvā sakkāraṃ karomi mā
anya-e1202n:282_0: Sakko devarājā cārikaṃ caranto taṃ disvā vissakammaṃ āmantetvā āha. Tāta, asoko dhammarājā
anya-e1202n:282_1: dhātuyo nīharissāmīti pariveṇaṃ otiṇṇo, gantvā kaṭṭharūpāni hārehīti so pañcacūḷagāma
anya-e1202n:282_2: dārakavesenāgantvā rañño purato dhanukahattho ṭhatvā hāremi mahārājāti āha. Hara
anya-e1202n:282_3: tātāti. Saraṃ gahetvā saṇdhimhiyeva vijjhi, sabbaṃ vippakirīyittha.
anya-e1202n:283_0: Atha rājā āciñjane baddha kuñcika muddikaṃ gaṇhi, maṇikkhaṇdhaṃ passi, anāgate daḷiddarājāno
anya-e1202n:283_1: imaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā dhātūnaṃ sakkāraṃ karontūti pana akkharāni disvā kujjhitvā mādisaṃ
anya-e1202n:283_2: nāma rājānaṃ daḷiddarājāti cattu yuttanti punappuna ghaṭetvā dvāraṃ vicaritvā antogehaṃ
anya-e1202n:283_3: paviṭṭho. Aṭṭhārasa vassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari āropitadīpā tatheva
anya-e1202n:283_4: pajjalanti niluppala pupphāni taṃ khaṇaṃ āharitvā āropitāni viya, pupphasaṇtharo
anya-e1202n:283_5: taṃ khaṇaṃ saṇthato viya, gaṇdhā taṃ muhuttaṃ piṃsitvā ṭhapitā viya.
anya-e1202n:284_0: Rājā suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ gahetvā anāgate piyadāsonāma kumāro chattaṃ ussāpetvā asoko nāma
anya-e1202n:284_1: dhammarājā bhavissati so imā dhātuyo gahetvā vitthārikā karissatīti vācetvā diṭṭho’haṃ
anya-e1202n:284_2: ayyona mahākassapattherenāti vatvā vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā dakkhiṇahatthena appoṭhesi.
anya-e1202n:285_0: So tasmiṃ ṭhāne paricaraṇaka dhātumattakameva ṭhapetvā sesadhātuyo sabbā gahetvā
anya-e1202n:285_1: dhātugharaṃ pubbe pihitanayeneva pidahitvā sabbaṃ yathā pakatiyāva kāretvā upari
anya-e1202n:285_2: pāsāṇacetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā caturāsītiyā vihārasahassesudhātuyo patiṭṭhāpesi evaṃ
anya-e1202n:285_3: jambudīpatale asoko dhammarājā caturāsiti cetiya sahassāni kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n:286: Sabbe thūpā sabbalokekadīpā sabbesaṃ ye saggamokkhāvahā ca, hitvā sabbaṃ kiccamaññaṃ janena vaṇdayyā te sabbathā sabbakālanti.
anya-e1202n:288_0: 12. Evaṃ asoko dhammarājā caturāsīti vihārasahassamahaṃ katvā mahāthero vaṇditvā
anya-e1202n:288_1: pucchi dāyādomhi bhante buddhasāsane’ti. Kissa dāyādo tvaṃ mahārāja, bāhirako tvaṃ
anya-e1202n:288_2: sāsanassāti. Bhante channavutikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā caturāsīti vihārasahassāni sacetiyāni
anya-e1202n:288_3: kārāpetvā ahaṃ na dāyādo, aññe ko dāyādoti, paccaya dāyako nāma tvaṃ mahārāja, yo
anya-e1202n:288_4: pana attano puttañca dhītarañca pabbājeti, ayaṃ sāsane dāyādo nāmāti.
anya-e1202n:289_0: Evaṃ vutte asoko rājā sāsane dāyādabhāvaṃ patthayamāno avidūre ṭhitaṃ mahiṇdakumāraṃ
anya-e1202n:289_1: disvā sakkhissasitvaṃ tāta pabbajitunti āha. Kumāro pakatiyā pabbajitukāmo rañño
anya-e1202n:289_2: vacanaṃ sutvā ativiya pāmojjajāto pabbjāmi deva, maṃ pabbājetvā sāsane dāyādo hothāti
anya-e1202n:289_3: āha tena ca samayena rājadhītā saṅghamittāpi tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitā hoti taṃ disvā āha-’tvampi
anya-e1202n:289_4: amma pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī’ti, sādhu tātāti sampaṭicchi. Rājā putta na manaṃ labhitvā
anya-e1202n:289_5: pahaṭṭhacitto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhante ime dārake pabbājetvā maṃ sāsane
anya-e1202n:289_6: dāyādaṃ karothāti saṅgho rañño vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā kumāraṃ moggaliputta tissattherena
anya-e1202n:289_7: upajjhāyena mahādevattherena ca ācariyena pabbajjāpesi. Majjhantikattherena ācariyena
anya-e1202n:290_0: Saṅghamittāyapi rājadhītāya ācariyā āyupālattheri nāma, upajjhāyā pana dhammapālattherī
anya-e1202n:290_1: nāma ahosi. Atha mahiṇdatthero upasampanna kālatoppabhūti attano upajjhāyasseva santike
anya-e1202n:290_2: dhammañca vinayañca pariyāpuṇanto dvepi saṅgitiyo āruḷhaṃ tipiṭaka saṅgahītaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ
anya-e1202n:290_3: theravādaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ abbhantare uggahetvā attano upajjhāyassa antevāsikānaṃ
anya-e1202n:291_0: Tena kho pana samayena moggaliputtatissatthero kattha nu kho anāgate sāsanaṃ suppatiṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e1202n:291_1: gaveyyāti upaparikkhanto paccantimesu janapadesu suppatiṭṭhitaṃ bhavissatīti ñatvā
anya-e1202n:291_2: tesaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhāraṃ katvā te te bhikkhu tattha tattha pesesi.
anya-e1202n:292_0: Majjhantikattheraṃ kasmīra gaṇdhāra raṭṭhaṃpesesi tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā tattha
anya-e1202n:292_1: sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehīti mahādevattheraṃ tatheva vatvā mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ pesesi. Rakkhitattheraṃvanavāsīṃ,
anya-e1202n:292_3: yonaka lokaṃ. Majjhimattheraṃ himavantadesa bhāgaṃ, soṇattheraṃ-uttarattherañca suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ.
anya-e1202n:292_4: Attano saddhivihārikaṃ mahiṇdattheraṃ iṭṭiyattherena uttiyattherena bhaddasālattherena
anya-e1202n:292_5: sambalattherena ca saddhiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpethāti.
anya-e1202n:292_6: Sabbepi taṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ gacchantā attapañcamā agamiṃsu sabbepi therā gatagataṭṭhāne
anya-e1202n:293_0: Mahiṇdatthero pana tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehīti upajjhāyena bhikkhusaṅghena
anya-e1202n:293_1: ca ajjhiṭṭho kālo nu kho me tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantuṃ noti upadhārento muṭasīvarañño
anya-e1202n:293_2: mahallakabhāvaṃ cintesi. Ayaṃ mahārājā mahallako, na sakkā imaṃ gaṇhitvā sāsanaṃ
anya-e1202n:293_3: paggahetuṃ, idāni panassa putto devānampiyatisso rajjaṃ kāressati. Taṃ gaṇhitvā sakkā
anya-e1202n:293_4: bhavissati sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ, haṇda yāva so samayo āgacchati tāva ñātake olokema,
anya-e1202n:293_5: puna’dāni imaṃ janapadaṃ āgaccheyyāma vā na vāti.
anya-e1202n:294_0: So evaṃ cintetvā upajjhāyañca bhikkhusaṅghañca vaṇditvā asokārāmato nikkhamma tehi
anya-e1202n:294_1: iṭṭiyādīhi catūhi therehi saṅghamittāya puttena sumanasāmaṇerena bhaṇḍukenaka ca
anya-e1202n:294_2: upāsakena saddhiṃ rājagahanagara upavattake dakkhiṇa girijanapade cārikaṃ caramāno
anya-e1202n:294_3: ñātake olokento cha māse atikkāmesi athānupubbena mātunivesanaṭṭhānaṃ veṭisa nagaraṃ
anya-e1202n:294_4: nāma sampatto sampattañca pana theraṃ disvā theramātā devī pāde sirasā vaṇditvā bhikkhaṃ
anya-e1202n:294_5: datvā theraṃ attanā kataṃ veṭisagiri vihāraṃ nāma āropesi.
anya-e1202n:295_0: Thero tasmiṃ vihāre nisanno cintesi amhākaṃ idha kattabba kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ. Samayo
anya-e1202n:295_1: nu kho idāni laṅkādipaṃ gantunti. Tato cintesi-anubhavatu tāva me pitarā pesitaṃ
anya-e1202n:295_2: abhisekaṃ devānampiyatisso ratanattayaguṇañca suṇātu, chaṇatthañca nagarato nikkhamitvā
anya-e1202n:295_3: missakapabbataṃ abhirūhatu tadā taṃ tattha dakkhissāmāti. Athāparaṃ ekamāsaṃ tattheva vāsaṃ kappesi.
anya-e1202n:296_0: Māsātikkame sakkodevānamiṇdo mahiṇdattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca.’ Kālakato bhante
anya-e1202n:296_1: muṭasīvarājā, idāni devānampiyatissa rājā rajjaṃ kāreti. Sammāsambuddhena ca tumhe
anya-e1202n:296_2: vyākatā anāgate mahiṇdo nāma bhikkhu tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pasādessatī’ti. Tasmā tiha vo
anya-e1202n:296_3: bhante kālo dīpavaraṃ gamanāya, ahampi vo sahāyo bhavissāmī.
anya-e1202n:297_0: Thero tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvāattasattamo veṭisa pabbatavihārā vehāsaṃ uppatitva
anya-e1202n:297_1: anurādhapurassa puratthimāya disāya missakapabbate patiṭṭhahi yaṃ etarahi cetiyapabbatotipi
anya-e1202n:297_2: sañjānanti tassamiṃ divase tambapaṇṇidipe jeṭṭhamūla nakkhattaṃ nāma hoti rājā nakkhattaṃ
anya-e1202n:297_3: ghosāpetvā chaṇaṃ karothāti amacce āṇāpetvā cattālīsa purisa sahassaparivāro nagarambhā
anya-e1202n:297_4: nikkhamitvā yena missakapabbato tena pāyāsi migavaṃ kīḷitukāmo atha tasmiṃ pabbate
anya-e1202n:297_5: adhivatthā devatā rañño there dassessāmīti rohita migarūpaṃ gahetvā avidūre tiṇapaṇṇāni
anya-e1202n:298_0: Rājā disvā ayuttaṃ dāni pamattaṃ vijjhitunti jīyaṃ poṭhesi. Mago ambatthalamaggaṃ
anya-e1202n:298_1: gahetvā palāyituṃ ārabhi rājāpi piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubaṇdhanto ambatthalameva āruhi.
anya-e1202n:299_0: Mahiṇdatthero rājānaṃ avidūre āgacchantaṃ’mamaṃyeva rājā passatu, mā itare’ti adhiṭṭhahitvā’tissa!
anya-e1202n:299_1: Tissa! Ito ehī’ti āha. Rājā sutvā cintesi-imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe jāto maṃ tissoti
anya-e1202n:299_2: nāmaṃ gahetvā ālapituṃ samattho nāma natthi. Ayampana chinnabhinnapaṭadharo bhaṇḍukāsāva
anya-e1202n:299_3: vasano maṃ nāmena ālapati, ko nu kho ayaṃ bhavissati manusso vā amanusso vāti. Thero āha.
anya-e1202n:302_0: Tena samayena devānampiyatissa rājā ca asokadhammarājā ca adiṭṭha sahāyakā honti.
anya-e1202n:302_1: Devānampiyatissa raññe ca puññānubhāvena chātapabbatapāde ekasmiṃ veḷugumbe tisso
anya-e1202n:302_2: veḷuyaṭṭhiyo nibbattiṃsu ekā latāyaṭṭhi nāma, ekā pupphayaṭṭhi nāma ekā sakuṇayaṭṭhi
anya-e1202n:302_3: nāma. Tāsu latāyaṭṭhi sayaṃ rajatavaṇṇā hoti taṃ alaṅkaritvā uppannalatā kañcana
anya-e1202n:302_4: vaṇṇā khāyati pupphayaṭṭhiyaṃ pana nīla-pīta-lohita-odāta-kāḷavaṇṇāni pupphāni sucibhattavaṇṭa
anya-e1202n:302_5: patta kiñjakkhā hutvā khāyanti sakuṇayaṭṭhiyaṃ haṃsakukkuṭa-jīvaṃjīvakādayo sakuṇā
anya-e1202n:302_6: nānāppakārāni ca catuppadāni sajīvāni viya khāyanti samuddatopissa muttā-maṇi-veḷuriyādi
anya-e1202n:303_0: Tambapaṇṇiyaṃ pana aṭṭhamuttaṃ uppajjiṃsu-bhayamuttā gajamuttā rathamuttā āmalakamuttā
anya-e1202n:303_1: calayamuttā aṅgulīveṭhakamuttā kakudhaphalamuttā pākatikamuttāti so tā ca yaṭṭhiyo
anya-e1202n:303_2: tā ca muttāyo aññca bahuṃ ratanaṃ asokassa dhammarañño paṇṇākāratthāya pesesi. Asokopi
anya-e1202n:303_3: pasīditvā pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāniceva aññe ca abhisekatthāya bahūpaṇṇākāre pahiṇi.
